1.title: Choose your character!

choices: Butt expansion {not that hers isn't already massive...}
11.content: Here's the first batch of options for the sexy kickboxing accountant kitty Rachael. How would you like this ass-heavy cutie to expand?
11.title: Rachael

111.content: Does she bloat up due to simple careless overeating, forcefeeding, or a special motive?
111.title: Weight gain

choices: They decide to order from some fast food places
They pay the nearest snack shop a visit
They ask Taffy to make them lots of pastries
1111.content:
Rachael was working out in the barn one afternoon, beating up the punching bag, when Sarah came in to see her. The younger cat is holding a partly-eaten chocolate bar, a sight which made Rachael a bit uneasy, and she looks like she wants to ask something. "Hey there, sis.", Rachael greets her, "Got something on your mind?"

"On my mind? Nope! In my mouth? Yes!", the white cat cheers, holding up her chocolate bar. "Yummy chocolate!" Rachael nods, smiling a bit at Sarah's enthusiasm, but then looks a bit more serious. "I just hope you don't expect me to try some."

"Aww... Why not? It's yummy and it gives you energy!", Sarah cheers again, holding it up to Rachael. "Try it!" Rachael backs away. "Woah, no way! You know I don't eat that stuff!", she replies quickly, "You shouldn't even be eating it--it's not good for you, and it'll make you fat!"

Sarah shakes her head and steps up to Rachael again. "Not if you work out like you do sis! You won't get fat and you can work out longer!", she says while swishing her tail playfully. "Pwease??"

"No, Sarah!", the black cat insisted once more, "I'm not getting my lips anywhere near that artery-clogging junk!" She figured this would get Sarah to stop... But then she remembered Sarah's secret weapon... "Don't you dare...", she warned the younger kitty as she saw her preparing to do it...

"B-but... Rach~!" Sarah makes her big-eyed pouty face and sniffles at her sister.
Rachael tries to resist, but finally finds herself giving in with a heavy sigh. She takes the chocolate bar from Sarah. "If I have a heart attack after eating this, I hope you know how to call the hospital.", she grumbles as she slowly takes a bite...

Sarah watches happily and swishes her tail again. "Well??"

Rachael chews and swallows the chocolate, and remains silent for a moment, before her eyes widen, and she yells... "Oh, what the hell, I'm not gonna hide it anymore!" With that, she begins wolfing down the entire bar.

"Yay!! Rachael approves!", Sarah cheers, jumping up and down with glee. "Want another?", she asks as she offers the black cat another bar. Rach nods gleefully. "I don't wanna know where you pulled that from, but of course I want it!", she confirms, grabbing it and tearing the wrapper open, nomming it all down. "I knew you loved it all along, Sis--Taffy told me you're addicted!", Sarah giggles, grinning widely. "I am, Sarah... I am addicted... And I want more...! Sarah, where do you keep those?", she asked, suddenly alot more hyperactive than usual.

"I have more back in my room, Rach!" Sarah grabs Rachael's hand and drags her to her room. Rachael giddily follows Sarah to her room, eager to see this stash of chocolate. "Rach... Behold!" The hyper kitty shows Rachael the stash of chocolate bars hidden in the dresser in her room. Rachael lets out a very high-pitched squeal and grabs an armload of them, murring as she eats them, a heavy blush covering her very aroused-looking face. "What else do I still need to know the taste of?", she wonders out loud with her mouth full of chocolate. "I avoided chocolate for years until I came here, so what else have I been missing out on? Maybe it's time to start enjoying more junk food!" She grins, lips smeared with chocolate, pointing a chocolate-covered finger into the air. "I'm gonna make up for those lost years!", she declares proudly, "Besides, I'm sure I could work it all off within a couple of weeks!"

"Yay!! That's the spirit!" Sarah encourages her sister.
1111.title: Making Up For Lost Time

choices: Flash forward to the day of the contest
11111.content:
Rachael had a great idea as she and Sarah went down to the den. "How about we order up some fast food?", she suggested with a grin, "I know you've always wanted me to try some, so now's my chance!"

"Yes! Yes! Pizza! Burgers!" Sarah jumped up and down in glee as she grabbed a phone book. "Pick a place, sis!" Rachael began looking through the phone book, dialing the nearest fast food restaurants and ordering a few meals for herself and Sarah. Before long, the kittens have received their food and gone back to their room to feast.

Sarah grinned and started to dig in happily. "Yummy! So tasty!", she purred as she ate a burger. Rachael picked up a burger and held it to her lips. She sniffed it, then slowly took a bite out of it...

Sarah took this opportunity to push it into Rachael's mouth. Rachael's eyes widened as her mouth suddenly became filled with burger, her expression softening as she chewed it. "Mmmm... So good...", she purred through a mouthful of meat and cheese as she enjoyed her first burger ever. "I want more!"

"Then dig in!", Sarah cheered, offering her sister a big slice of pizza, then digging in herself. The black kitty swallowed the burger and began eating the pizza, finding its flavour just as heavenly. She washed her food down with a nice large root beer, her purring growing louder as she continued stuffing her face with the greasy treats in front of her. Sarah purred and murred as she ate her pizza. "Cheese!"

Before long, the two hungry kittens have finished their meal, their bellies packed tight and slightly rounded. Rachael belched and rubbed her gut. "Man, we sure can pack it away...", she giggled. "Mmm... So yummy~" Sarah patted her belly. "How was it, Rach?"

"Better than I expected! We should do this again tomorrow!", Rachael purred. She looked over at her sister, rubbing the white kitten's big tummy. "You were right about this stuff!"

"Told ya!", Sarah giggled, licking her lips.

The kittens ended up continuing this for several days. They would order up a large dinner of fast food, and bring it up to their rooms to feast on, much to the confusion of the other residents, especially Taffy. Rachael knew this would affect her figure, but she decided not to worry about it. She could probably work it off in a week or less.

By the 6th day, the sisters had grown quite plump. Thanks to the privacy of their room being the place they had chosen to eat in--and the fact that this day was rather warm--they currently sat in their underwear as they ate.

The inevitable effects of Rachael’s constant snacking were beginning to reflect on her usually athletic figure. Her once-toned thighs had started to soften, deepening around the creases of her underwear elastic. The raven-furred beauty’s abs had given way to a hint of a belly, which was only made more prominent when she sat. Her chest had begun to flourish since her new diet had started. Not one to simply walk around bra-less, she had reluctantly put to use the bra that she received the previous Christmas from, unsurprisingly, Miles. While by no means obese yet, a delicate plushness had begun to cover her muscles. A week of inactivity, minimal movement, and stuffing her face with fast food had slowly but surely brought her weight up to nearly 200 pounds. Despite this rather dramatic gain, Rachael remained blissfully unaware of her changing body. Food was slowly becoming her world.

Sarah had gained far more weight than Rachael, weighing well over 200 pounds, and due to her shorter height, it showed clearly. Her breasts weighed heavily against her increasingly flabby midsection, the latter developing into her most dominant feature. Her poundage was unevenly distributed across her short frame. Like a melting scoop of ice cream, her belly began to spread its influence to and past her chest, allowing her swollen breasts to ooze over the top of her nightshirt. Sarah’s perpetual binging left her butt fairly large, her panties showing just how fat she was actually getting as they became wedged between her rump's bloated cheeks.

"Ooohh... Yummy! ", Sarah purred happily, blushing. Rachael purred as she watched her sister gleefully pig out. "Hey, sis... I hear there's an eating contest at the pizza place this weekend. Wanna enter with me?"

"Yeah!!", Sarah cheered, "Let's do it!" Rachael smiled and gave Sarah's belly a soft pat. "Thought you'd want to!", she giggled. "It's on Sunday--you might want to save your binging energy until then."

"I've got LOTS of energy! Bring it on!"
11111.title: They decide to order from some fast food places

111111.content:
It was finally Sunday, and Rachael and Sarah have arrived at the pizza place to participate in the eating contest. Rach takes a moment to look around at the--mostly female, to her surprise--competition. "They don't look like they can handle it... I know either you or I can win this one, Sarah." Sarah raises her fist with a grin on her face and cheers. "We shall win and eat yummy foods!" She then tilts her head. "What's the prize?"

A very plump vixen walks up to her, smiling warmly. It seems this woman is the manager. "The grand prize is a cheque for $10,000, young lady!" Rachael's grin widens as she hears this. "$10,000? Mora's gonna be thrilled if we win!" Sarah's eyes grew wide when she heard the prize. "W-We gotta win!! Let's do it, Rach!!"

The manager giggles and begins assembling the contestants, seating them at a long row of tables as a small audience forms. "The rules are quite simple--the last person to drop out of the contest for any reason wins! Until then, stuff yourself like crazy!" Sarah licks her lips. "I'm SO gonna win this! Just watch me!"

The manager signals for the contestants to start eating, each one of them digging into the pizzas placed in front of them. Rachael eats like the world might end if she doesn't wolf it down fast enough. "Mmm... Delicious... No way I'm dropping out..." Sarah eats her pizzas like she hasn't eaten in forever, getting grease and cheese all over herself.

5 minutes in, they were still going. After 10 minutes, 17 of the 20 contestants remained. Rachael laughs to herself. Those three who left were so very weak. But not her--she was going to win this one... Sarah eyes the other contestants with a sly grin as she devours her delicious pizzas. "Hehe... I've so got this...", she thought to herself.

15 minutes in, and two more contestants had left... 20, and another was gone... And Rachael still kept going... Upon swallowing her umpteenth mouthful of pizza, however, Rachael realized that something was wrong. Her endurance began to weaken as her belly encroached upon its limits. As she packed herself tighter and tighter, it began to take on a more spherical shape. Her developing rolls were stretched and obscured by her growing gut. The desire to eat was beginning to disappear as her progress through each pizza slowed.

Sarah let out a loud burp and rubbed her now larger belly in delight for a moment before digging back in. Rachael fought to continue, not wanting to lose in front of Sarah. Before long, the pizzas were gone, only Sarah, herself, and 10 others remaining in the contest as the manager called for an intermission. "Mmm...so good! I want more! More, I say!!", Sarah shouts.

"You've all done well! But now it's time for something else entirely!", the manager announces. "Each of you must finish off an entire novelty-size slush drink!" Rachael groaned at the thought of it, feeling a bit sick, but she tried to remain strong anyway. Sarah drooled, her eyes widening again. "Mine!" She grabs hers and starts gulping it down.

Rachael reluctantly picks hers up and starts drinking it. Rachael felt her belly quickly becoming much colder as she gulped down the 2-foot-tall icy drink. By the time she finished the drink about three or four minutes later, Rachael’s great sphere of a belly hung over the edge of her tight panties and spilled into her lap. Her skirt had unzipped, loosely hanging around her thighs. Moving the cold container off of her swollen tummy, she groaned as she slumped over and hugged her aching belly. "Oooh... I’m gonna burst..."

Sarah purred and shivered as she finished hers. "Ooooo... Pizza now, please?" The manager looked around at the remaining contestants--Rachael, Sarah, and only 5 others. She giggled as she noticed how big they had all gotten. "Yes, little one--each of you must now eat one massive pizza!" Each contestant is given an absurdly large pizza, and the manager signals for them to continue eating. Sarah's eyes grew big again and she began to drool before starting to devour her huge pizza.

Rachael manages to continue only by reminding herself that this is the final round. Her confidence grows as she watches two more contestants quit, and as she watches Sarah gleefully pig out despite her massively bloated tummy. "I...can...do this... I know..I can..." Sarah pays no mind to the other contestants as she eats and gets bigger and rounder. "Yummy... Hey, Rach, if you dont finish, can I have yours?"

Rachael watches one more contestant leave. She and Sarah are the only ones left now. With one last groan of effort, she manages to stuff the last two pieces into her mouth, slowly chewing and swallowing them, just as Sarah finishes her own. "Wooo! Did I win? Did I?", Sarah cheers, looking around curiously.

The manager holds up both kittens' arms and cheers, "We have two winners, ladies and gentlemen!" The audience loudly applauds as Rachael and Sarah stand up, both a little wobbly, and accept their cheque. "W-We won! We really won!", Rachael purrs, rubbing her painfully stuffed belly. "YAY!! WE WON!!" Sarah hugs Rachael tightly and purrs. "WE DID IT~!!" Rachael belches and hugs Sarah, their tummies pressing together. "Let's go home and show everyone...", she giggles, waddling out the door with Sarah, trying to get used to her large gut for now.
111111.title: Flash forward to the day of the contest

choices: The next day, Mora decides to take everyone to the movie theater...
The next morning, Minos and Randal bring Rach and Sarah breakfast...
1111112.content:
The kittens soon returned to the farm, Rachael silently hoping the long walk had helped her shed a little weight. "We're home!", she called as she and Sarah entered the living room. Sarah cheered as she entered the room. "And we have good news!" Taffy, who was in the kitchen, came out and tilted her head at the kittens curiously. "Welcome home. What's this good news, dears?" Rachael showed her the cheque. "We won $10,000 in an eating contest!", she giggled, rubbing her full belly.

Taffy's eyes widened in surprise and Sarah cheered again and jumped. "Yeah! We ate good food and got good money!" Taffy blinked several times. "W-W-Wow! This is great! I'll go get Mora!" Taffy smiles with a nod and leaves to call Mora. Rachael grins, sitting down and letting out a nice belch. "Looks like Helium Hooters is gonna have to respect us alot more now, eh, Sarah?"

"Yeah! She better after bringing her all this cash!" Sarah grinned and burped loudly. After a moment, Taffy returned with Mora, who jumped back in shock upon seeing Rachael and Sarah. "What the hell happened to you? You look like you swallowed beachballs!", she exclaimed. "Y-Yeah, they do... But they brought home a cheque worth $10,000, Mora!", Taffy exclaimed and pointed at the check. "It was pizzas, Big-Boobs!" Sarah stuck her tongue out at Mora.

Mora fumed for a second at Sarah's comment, but suddenly grabbed the cheque and stared at it. "$10,000?! Rachael, Sarah, I never thought I'd say this, but you've really helped me out!" Rachael glared at her. "Never thought you'd say it? Real nice, Turbo Tits! I mean, I only do your damn accounting every day!"

"N-Now, let's all calm down... How about I make dinner...or are you two not hungry?", Taffy asked with a nervous smile on her face. "Yay! Food!" Sarah licked her lips. Rachael opened her mouth to speak, blushing as her belly growled. "I'll have something too." She noticed Randal entering the room next, and wondered how he might react...

Randal froze and stared at the kittens with wide eyes, a faint blush on his face. "Well... Hello, kittens... You look...bigger today.", he chuckles, smiling at Taffy. "What are you feeding these girls? I want some as well." Taffy drooped her ears back. "Just the normal food!" Rachael's blush grew a bit deeper. "We entered a pizza-eating contest...", she chuckled nervously, rubbing her swollen tummy. "Well, I see that now, how did that...go...?" Randal pasued when he saw the cheque, and clapped his hands. "Bravo, girls!" Sarah giggled and rubbed her belly. "I did better though!" By now, Miles has seen them as well, a look of slight disgust on his face as he stared at them. Rachael scowled at him. "Okay, what the fuck is your problem?"

"Oh, I dunno... You've suddenly traded in your hot bodies for fatass ones?", he replied bluntly. Randal placed a hand over Miles' mouth and shook his head. "No need to be rude, Miles. It's their bodies and they can do as they please." Miles pushed the puppy away. "Whatever...", he muttered as he walked away, frowning. Rachael began cursing under her breath at him, hating him even more, if that were possible. Minos came in next to see what the commotion was about, stopping in his tracks as he saw Rachael. "Rachael...?" Mora nodded. "That's her, alright."

Randal and Taffy nodded in agreement. "Mhmm! It's us, Mr. Robot!", Sarah giggled, waving. Mora noticed Minos staring at Rachael, who was now blushing heavily, and directed his attention to the cheque. "They ruined their figures all to help us out! Isn't that nice of them?", she giggled. "Ruined is a bad word to use when you say it like that Mora... They just...made a little sacrifice to help us is all...", Randal pointed out, his ears drooping. Minos glanced at the cheque, nodding and turning his attention back to Rachael. "Congratulations.", he said to the kittens, a small smile on his face. "Th-Thanks, Minos...", Rach purred.

Taffy sighs in relief then heads to the kitchen. "I'll get started on dinner."

Rachael and Sarah found it very difficult to quit their new eating habits during the days that followed the day of the contest. The plump kittens continued to eat junk food at every meal, slowly becoming much softer, wider and heavier. The others kept showing the same reactions and emotions as before--some shocked, some concerned, some amused, Miles disgusted. Three days would soon pass since the contest, Rachael and Sarah currently sharing another fast food dinner in their pajamas.

Sarah purred as she ate and jiggled. "Yummy yum yummy~! We're getting big, Sis!", Sarah laughed. Rachael giggled, her mouth full of pizza. "Damn right we are!", she purred, rubbing her gut. "And I think I'm gonna stay this way--Minos has been paying way more attention to me lately!" She took a moment to gleefully examine her figure. Her soft cotton panties have begun to stretch thin over her widening rear, growing tighter with each passing day like too little butter on a dinner roll. She's very bottom-heavy, a pear figure. A set of gracious love handles rest atop extra-wide hips. Deepening cleavage runs down the opening of her pajama top. Since the day of the contest, her appetite had increased dramatically. Larger and larger servings had become required to satisfy what’s become an insatiable hunger. From the time her feet hit the floor in the morning to when she crawled into bed, she constantly ate. Every sugary, salty or greasy treat that passed her lips undid years of hard discipline and self-denial.

"Mmmm, and Randal has too! They're both so nice to us, Sis! We should ask them to be butlers!", Sarah suggested and burped. "So we don't have to get up!" The young white kitten had gotten quite the impressive figure herself. Her breasts were her largest feature so far, as if to contrast her sister's rear. They could be easily compared to a pair of massive marshmallows. Her belly was quickly catching up, round and fluffy like a huge pillow. Her butt was starting to split the seams of her pajama pants, each beautiful cheek like a soft mound of jello, gently jiggling with each movement the cat made. Sarah was very happy with her new body, and secretly wanted it to grow much fatter.

"You really think we should aim for immobility?", the black kitten chuckles. "Well, if you want to, go ahead, but I'm not so sure I'd want to." With an audible slosh, Rachael realigns herself on the bed. Her belly is no longer as large as it was at the end of the contest, but it is slowly returning to that size. It's still full with the numerous helpings consumed during her meals. Sarah rubbed her head. "Well, I never said I wanted to do it for a long time, just a little bit, y'know?" Rachael nods, rubbing Sarah's tummy. "Okay, maybe for a little while.", she replies with a warm smile. "I'm sure Randal will be happy to serve you--I think he's hot for you.", she adds, giggling.

Sarah blushed softly and giggled. "Oh?"

"Yeah, have you seen the way he blushes when you're near him?", she adds, "And have you noticed he's been acting a bit more nervous when talking to you?" Sarah shyly shook her head. Rachael giggles again and lays down, rubbing her stuffed belly. "Mmmm... I'm so full..."

"So am I...", Sarah yawns, closing her eyes a bit. "Mmmm... Cat nap time?" Rachael nods and closes her eyes. "Cat nap time...", she replies with a yawn. Sarah purred and layed down, her body jiggling slighty as she drifted off to sleep.
1111112.title: Back at home...

11111121.content: This path is temporarily closed due to personal plans to continue it soon. Sorry for the inconvenience.
11111121.title: The next day, Mora decides to take everyone to ...

choices: When they arrive home, they find that a big dinner has been spread out!
The owner of the candy shop wants to offer a deal to them.
11112.content:
Sarah and Rachael walked down the sidewalk in town, with Sarah leading the way. "Are you sure you haven't gotten us lost, Sarah?" remarked Rachael, who was not familiar with this part of the town. "Of course not I haven't!" she giggled. "There's no way I could forget how to find a place like this~!" Rachael sighed, "If you say so..." As the two cats continued to walk, Rachael began to catch a scent. A scent of candy. That candy smell that smells...candy-y................................................................ . "Your tummy's growlin', sis!" spouted an excited Sarah suddenly. Blushing heavily, Rachael put her hands on her stomach. "N-no it's not...." .......Rrrruuuurrrrrr...rrrghh... "Okay, I'm pretty much starving," she sighed, whilst Sarah giggled.

Eventually, they reached their destination: the big snack shop on centre street. "Here we go~" giggled Sarah, and the two walked in...Rachael went wide eyed. Inside the store was every treat she could imagine, and many more she couldn't. People on the other side of the sore looked around confusedly as Rachael's stomach rumbled louder than ever, making her blush a bright red. "Hehehe, silly Rach...well, go crazy, eat and eat til your tummy is ready to pop!" Rachael nodded, and began digging into whatever treats were closest. She decided to attempt one of everything to see what she liked best. "Mmn, so good!" she grinned before downing another mouthful of candy. "Mff, rfmf grrff!" replied Sarah, who didn't bother to stop eating when talking.

As Rachael finished trying out all of the flavours, she let out a small burp. Looking down, she put a hand onto her stomach. She was quite full...rather stuffed, actually, her toned stomach just starting to push out. But the candy, pastries, and the like were all just too good to pass up. "Gotta keep going..." Sarah was still eating, her flat tummy had bulged out more than Rachael's, as she ate faster. Rachael preemptively downed a few antacids, and continued to gorge herself. After a few minutes, she groaned, reaching down, and unbuttoned her pants. Her once trim stomach, which was muffin-topping moments before, bloated out to the size of a 6 month pregnant gut, giving a loud, sloshy gurgle. Rachael was too busy sighing with relief from the release of the pressure to be embarrassed.

Later on, the two stumbled out of the shop, both cats looking like their were ready to deliver a litter of 3. Their overstuffed bellies sloshed and gurgled as they waddled down the street. "That was good, Sarah...hic...I can't believe we ate so much...ORRRRRAAARRRP!!" Sarah giggled, letting out own "Eeeerrpp~!{/i]
11112.title: They pay the nearest snack shop a visit

choices: Mora, to keep her out of the way
Miles, to keep her to himself
1112.content: Who is it that forcefeeds Rachael?
1112.title: Forcefeeding

11123.content:
Lately at the Las Lindas farm things had been a little crazier than usual. Sarah Silkie, the younger of the cat siblings had been learning from Taffy how to cook, mostly sweets. Recently though Sarah had discovered she had a knack for cooking.

She had begun to make anything she could think of, cookies, cakes, and even home made ice cream. Taffy often sampled her food, but was too busy to really eat much. Recently the bunny's figure had become more filled out as a result of what she did consume.

Thinking about this Sarah decided to try and feed someone who exercised often, and who better than her own sister Rachael?

The black cat saw no issue with this. So Sarah came in with...
11123.title: Sarah, for fun

choices: The next morning, Sarah has more treats for Rachael to try.
After a week of eating Sarah's treats at every meal...
111231.content:
Rachael sat patiently in her room, waiting for Sarah to return with some food for her to try out. Sure, it wasn't the healthiest food...okay, it was crap when it came to health...but Rachael could easily work it off. Besides, her stomach had been growling all morning, and she had to admit that the thought of the food gave her a hunger that veggies would be hard pressed to satisfy.

"Rachael, it's ready~!" sang Sarah as she brought in a big plate of various treats; ice cream, cakes, cookies, bread rolls, doughnuts, practically everything she could fit onto the platter. "That's...quite a lot..." said Rachael, giving a suspicious eye. "I know, right? I wanna make sure all of them are good, Rach! You can work it off anyway~" Sarah giggled and Rachael blushed a bright red as her trim stomach let out a low Grrrgrgrgrgrrrr... "Alright then....uhhh...which should I try first?" Thinking to herself for a moment, Sarah said "Try the cookies~ :3 Just take whatever's closest after that." Shrugging, Rachael picked up a cookie, which wanted to melt between her fingers since it was just out of the oven, and took a fair sized bite out of it. Quickly, her eyes lit up, and the devoured the rest of the cookie. "That was GOOD, Sarah, how'd you learn so quickly?!" she said excitedly, and began cramming more cookies down. "Oh, you know, practice, and Taffy helps too...eat all you want~!"

Rachael kept on eating and eating, trying all sorts of foods that Sarah had baked. After about 10 minutes, she had finished most of he plate, and lied back, sighing contently. Her shirt was rolled up, showing her slightly bloated stomach. "Rachael?" poked Sarah. Letting out a small burp, Rachael asked what was up. "There's still a few more treats you haven't tasted..." Rachael hiccuped a bit. "Oof, I'm stuffed Sarah, I couldn't..." Sarah's ears started to droop a bit as she started to refuse. "Um...but...ah...but I still have a erp! bit more room..." Sarah lit right back up, and began offering more of her treats.

After 15 minutes, the last crumbs of the plate had been cleared. "Did you like it, Rach?" she asked happily. A rather dazed Rachael nodded, "Wonderful...Ooooorrrppp..." Sarah giggled, but Rachael groaned. "Somethin' wrong, Rach...?" Hiccuping again, Rachael shook her head. "No....no, I'm fine, just...sooooo full..." Her (realistically...for now) bloated stomach let out an unpleasant moan as it struggled to digest its big meal. Rachael just sighed and fell asleep.
111231.title: A platter of food

1112311.content:
Rachael groaned as she woke up, yawning and stretching, before scratching her stomach a bit, feeling its slightly plush texture, confused as she felt her fingertips sink in ever so gently, before shaking her head and getting ready to get up, only for the door to open, startling her as Sarah entered, smiling "Morning Rachael!" she said brightly, carrying a platter of freshly baked goodies that Rachael just knew were for her, making her blush some.

"uh...morning Sarah...." she said, watching as her sister placed the platter full of goodies on the bed, from what Rachael could see, this platter was even larger than the one the previous day, loaded to capacity with delectable treats, Sarah even snacking on a few herself as she sat with her sister, smiling. "time for breakfast~" she said, chipper and perky as she held up a sweetroll to Rachael's mouth, smiling.

Rachael sighed, eating the treats she was offered, allowing her sister to feed her, since she seemed so eager, blushing some as treat after treat disappeared into her waiting gut, making her groan a bit as she kept eating, thankful Sarah was helping her eat the packed platter of treats, so that her taxed stomach could rest a bit as she chowed down.

After a few minutes of non-stop eating, the two girls lay on Rachael's bed, groaning a bit at their full tummies, Sarah smiling some at her sister. "Heh, now i know how you felt yesterday Rach.." she said, rubbing her packed white gut, finding the slightly rounded bulge rather intriguing.

"heh, not so good when you've stuffed yourself silly huh...?" Rach jibed, prodding her sisters belly with a finger, making her giggle and burp. "heh, well, at least the food was yummy~" Sarah relented, giggling as she got up, stretching, the curve in her belly highlighted as she got the platter and walked out, leaving Rachael to massage her belly, easing some of the strain as she felt just how stuffed she'd become, before getting up herself and going to do a workout.

However, when she got to the gym, she realised...
1112311.title: The next morning, Sarah has more treats for Rac...

choices: She wants to be a better sex partner for Minos
She's already gotten very obese and decides to see how much bigger she can get
She's made a bet with Miles that involves competitive eating against him
1113.content: What motivates her to gain?
1113.title: Motive

choices: Headed towards the barn were gallons of rich crème were stored.
She flat out asked Taffy to make something fattening to eat
11131.content:

“Dainty?!” This unintended insult was enough to twinge Rachael’s perfect day. She’d known for a long time that most men were only looking for two things on a girl, ass and tits, not her smarts or her interests. But Minos she had hoped would have been different! Sure Ms. flabby cow might have a good 50lbs on Rachael, but Rachael would never consider her own self dainty. Why, that corn fed cow was probably more fat than muscle when it came down to it!

“Well…” Rachael thought inwardly, standing up on the spot. “If Minos thinks I’m dainty, maybe I could do so some bulking up…” And with that she dedicated herself on her new affections aspirations.

The next day Rachael began resolutely on her plan. Yes, there was plenty of food on the farm that could go towards filling out her frame, bur Rachael wanted results now! That thought in mind she…

Rachael blushed a little and made her request. "Uh... Well... I'd like you to make me something really fattening. Anything you can think of. I need to get fat so Minos will like me more." Rachael gave it some thought and then grinned as her favourite of Taffy's baked treats came to mind. "How about a few of those cakes you like making for me? Black forest cake with Snickers bars on top?" Taffy giggles and nods, seeming a bit excited. Probably just because she gets to bake more though, it couldn't be anything else, Rachael tells herself.

"Right away, sweetie! How many do you want? I have time to make more than one!"

"Oh, good thing, cause I'm hungry for..."

However, Rachael became annoyed by Taffy's hesitation and replied, "Of course I want a dozen black forest cakes, Taff! I said I wanted to get fat so Minos would like me more! Why can't you understand that?!" Then, Rachael began to show tears in her eyes. Seeing that made Taffy feel guilty about rejecting Rachael for what she wanted.

After all, when Mora wasn't around the house, Taffy was the mother figure to Rachael & her little sis, Sarah, seeing as how the two feline siblings were orphans and had no place to call their own. So, in an attempt to calm Rachael down, the pink-haired rabbit went over to Rachael and comforted her, as Taffy gently scratched behind Rachael's ears and said, "There there, Rachael. It's alright, I'm just about you getting a stomach-ache while you're eating a dozen of my black forest cake. I didn't mean to hurt your feelings about Minos, honest."

"~sob~ I know you're not trying to hurt me, Taffy. I just want Minos to really like me!" Rachael replied, as she wiped some of the tears from her eyes. Taffy then decided to give what Rachael wanted, as the pink-haired rabbit grabbed her pink frilly apron and began the dozen black forest cakes Rachael wanted, as Taffy turned her head to look at Rachael and said, "I must warn you, Rachael. These cakes are going to take a few hours to make sure they're baked right, so you'll have to wait until I'm done, OK?"

11132.content:
The past several months hadn't exactly gone well for Rachael. First there had been the incident with Mora, and her breaking her leg jumping into the well. Rachael wouldn't admit it, but she was depressed after that, badly, her ego taking a near fatal hit. Her attitude only drove people away, making her all the more blue. With no one to comfort her, the only thing that could lift Rachael's mood was a plateful of chocolate chip cookies or a pint of ice cream. Then the cast had come off, Rachael tried to get back into exercising....and found her body flabby and way out of shape. Rachael nearly cracked. Her training equipment began to gather dust as she sat in her room with a tub of ice cream, a spoon, and one ton of self-loathing. It was a vicious process, her weight driving her depression driving her to eat, driving her weight.

Finally, of all people, Taffy reached out to Rachael with what she needed - a mother figure. Taffy forced Rachael out of bed like the grumpy teen she really was, gave Rachael things to do with herself now that she had so much free time not exercising. Mostly kitchen tasks, and Rachael had slowly learned to cook. Unfortunately, Taffy didn't care for Rachael's weight, which only steadily grew under the bunny's care. But Rachael, in a way, stopped caring. If Taffy found her upset, she'd only fuss until Rachael felt like apologizing for being upset.

"Rachael, time to get up." Taffy said, tossing Rachael's covers off her bed. Rachael groaned. A small mountain of kitten lay on the bed. Rachael had become obese by now. A lot of it went to her belly, which had grown steadily and smoothly, causing it to become a smooth apron of fat that just billowed out from her, covering her thighs even when she was laid back. Her sides reach beyond the edges of the bed on both sides, great jelly rolls of black fur. Rachael looked like she was sleeping on a hillside, as a great bubbly ass propped up her lower half. That made Rachael's tits slide chinwards. She was destined to be small up top, but compared to her monster ass DD was still small. Rachael's cleavage peaked out of the neck hole of a badly stretched night shirt. Taffy sighed, not at Rachael's obesity, but at her reluctance to remove herself from her funk.

"Come on dear, wake up." she said sweetly.

How did Rachael respond?
11132.title: Rachael's downfall

111322.content:
"Sure thing Taffy." Rachael said, rubbing her eyes. Taffy reached out with both arms, a smile on her face, and helped Rachael up. The two of them had slowly become used to Rachael's ballooning weight, and Taffy was so adamant to help Rachael out that she had gotten accustomed to helping Rachael with numerous small tasks. it took both of them to heave Rachael on to her feet. Her obese body jiggled about, barely contained by her badly over-stretched pajamas.

"Do you want my help getting dressed, dear?" Taffy asked tentatively. She wasn't oblivious to Rachael's body, she just didn't care about her weight, and so she had noticed the struggle Rachael tended to have with various tasks that a month ago hadn't given her pause. She had asked almost daily this question for the last week, as she found Rachael taking longer and longer to get dressed and looking increasingly winded by the time she managed. This time, instead of rejecting the request out of hand like she had been, Rachael paused and considered. She looked blue, the scraps of her old pride trying to stop her from asking for help on such a supposedly simple, and intimate task. Still, Rachael turned to Taffy meekly, looking defeated.

"Maybe a little..." she said, tail down. Taffy just gave her a comforting smile, and as she walked past Rachael to the closet she laid a hand on Rachael's shoulder. Rachael's tail twitched up at that.

"Here we go, darling." Taffy said, having picked out an outfit for Rachael. She kept meaning to get the kitten proper clothes, but there never seemed to be the time. So Rachael didn't exactly have anything that fit. At least bras they had had to spare. Taffy stood behind Taffy and began to tug up her shirt. Rachael did her best to raise her meaty arms over her head, an arduous task given that each one was covered in a thick layer of blubber that made her forearms thicker than any other woman's thighs. Rachael's furry breasts flopped down on to her belly shelf, making the blobby kitten blush profusely.

"My my, you'll be outgrowing my bras soon!" Taffy said, helping Rachael in to just one of those. "I'm almost jealous!"

"No you're not..." Rachael said, blue again, "No one's jealous of me...."

"Rachael." Taffy said, her tone going from sweet to assertive in a snap. "You have a lot to be thankful for. And you are a beautiful girl. I mean that, I wouldn't just say that." Taffy moved in and wrapped her arms around Rachael - well, she tried. She just gripped the sides of Rachael's massive belly and hugged Rachael tight from behind. She couldn't see Rachael go red, burning straight through her fur.

"T-Taffy? I'm thankful for you..." Rachael mumbled. Taffy tried to keep a giggle to herself. Sure, Rachael had lost her spunk, and ultimately Taffy was working to get that back, to get her to her old self. But honestly, quieter Rachael wasn't all bad.

"Come on hun, let's get you dressed." she whispered, letting go of Rachael and bending down to get to Rachael's shorts.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------

Rachael took up the entire hall, or so much of it that only the thinnest could squeeze by, mostly thanks to her huge hips and giant bubbly ass, one that was always peeking out of the top of her stretchy black sweatpants. With her hips as wide as they were, it was no wonder she had such monstrous thighs that lifting them was a bit of a challenge, and Rachael's walking speed was easily half what it once was as she shuffled along. She was still mobile, by all accounts, she just sure couldn't get anywhere in a rush.

"Let's get you a proper breakfast to start the day, shall we hun?" Taffy asked sweetly, entering the kitchen after Rachael. Something possessed her to pat Rachael's belly as she walked past, but she didn't turn to see Rachael blush. Or see the way Rachael's tail twitched excitedly, the kitten forgetting to guard her emotions for a moment. While Taffy wasn't aware, the fact of the mater was that Rachael....

What's wrong, how come you're not eating?" "I... I..." Rachael's head tilted downward, the situation leaving her too befuddled to properly form a sentence, and instead of answering the young lapine woman's query, she seemed to have developed a keen interest in fidgeting with her pudgy fingers.

Taffy, eyes soft and caring, smiled at the fluffy kitten before her. Clearly, she realized, the young girl was having a much rougher morning than she'd thought, and with matronly grace she leaned across the table and plucked up the girl's set of utensils; cutting a slice of the delectable waffle before her, while making sure it had an even coating of syrup, sugar, and a nice piece of strawberry to top it off.

The black cat was lost in thought momentary, weighing in on the absurd question asked of her. Being fed? Like a little kid? By the woman she's had a growing crush on? As the gears in her mind slowly attempted to churn all this, she could barely hear what amounted to the effect of a saccharine sweet "Open wide, dear~"

Rachael's eyes bugged out as a piece of warm, buttery confection was firmly, but with a sense of care, prodded into her mouth. The pink haired girl's delicious home-cooking causing the portly feline's tail to twitch. "O- oh", she gently puffed, shocked at just what occurred. "Taffy I-"

Before she could eek out whatever was coming to her mind, another slice of the warm syrupy dish was guided into her mouth by the young but motherly bunny-girl. "You've got to eat to keep your energy up, we don't want you to go hungry, do we?"

Bite after bite, nibble after nibble, the home-cooked breakfast feast made its way into the black-furred kitten's mouth, whether she asked of it to or not, as the lapine's calm words and gentle pushing made Rachael weaker in the knees than she ever could think. She'd almost feel humiliated if it wasn't for the constantly assuring smile on the face of the woman before her. Plus her soft belly did enjoy the scrumptious dish that was being directly delivered to it.

As the meal finished up Rachael sat there with a slightly glazed looked in her eyes, hands gently sitting in her lap. She made no effort to stop the woman before her as she dabbled a bit of syrup away from her mouth with a napkin. "Did you like that, sweetie?"

"I-" Rachael paused one more time, her face beet red from blushing. "Thank you, Taffy"

*A FEW DAYS LATER*

A few days after what had occurred during that one breakfast, Rachael had begun to notice something....different in Taffy's behavior a little. At first, it began as a simple routine of having Taffy feeding her breakfast like a little kitten, which Rachael didn't seem to mind. After all, Taffy had all the right skills to be a good mother. However, when the lapine woman began to have Rachael wear this large babyish bib that said "I'm A Big Fat Kitty" during breakfast and lunch, she realized things might've gotten a little overboard.

And yet, for some odd reason......Rachael seemed to like the near babyish experience that Taffy was giving her, which made it somewhat difficult to decide on what to do: Either she snaps out of it and confess her crush toward Taffy, or just let the lapine woman continue her infantile treatment toward Rachael.

1113221211.content:
Rachael was feeling particularly vulnerable at the moment. Here she was sitting in a frilly bib with her crush looming at her side; the same soft smile that's been consistently on her face for the past few days as she seemingly more and more took charge of habits the black-furred feline would find inconsequential just a few months back. Right now the taller bunny woman was feeding Rachael gentle forkfuls of a homemade cake that she cooked as a reward for her being "such a good girl".

Being a "good girl" made Rachael feel happy in the oddest sense, but this whole experience had been leaving her in a whirlwind of emotions. Taffy had been there every step of the way to help her during her extended bout of depression, and much of her agency had been freely given away as a result of sheer lack of caring and bitter self loathing, but these past few turns had been peculiar to say the least. She loved that her crush had been directing her eyes more and more towards her, and it would be a lie to say that she's hated the treatment she'd been given in the last few days, but what kind of relationship could come about if she allowed this to continue? What would the next few steps entail? A sense of worried foreboding sank into the obese cat's mind as her body reacted slightly differently; her tail twitching with a tingly sense of electricity.

"Umm, Taffy?", Rachael asked in-between bites of the sweet confection.

"Yes, hun?" The pink haired Lapine responded, her fork hovering a few inches away from its intended target, the feeding momentarily stopped to look her kitten in the eye; spare hand gently rubbing the girl's soft belly.

It was now or never, the puffy feline figured. Later she would come to question if maybe she could have somehow set this up a whole lot better, but it didn't matter at the moment. Right now she was mustering up a sense of backbone that she hadn't felt in ages. Her face turned up toward her would-be love, eyes shut and with a scarlet red blush that could be seen from acres away, and said "I-"

But before she could get more than a word out, a particularly large bite of cake was poked into her mouth. "wuv... oyu...", the delectable taste of the dessert distracting the sweet-toothed girl, as her eyes opened half glazed, her mind reeling from a mixture of her confession, and frosting.

Taffy giggled as she looked at the little kitten before her. During all this, her bib had only managing to defend against some of the meal that was smudged around her face. She was such a silly thing. "Aww, I love you too, sweetie!"

Before Rachael could compose herself, she was taken aback even further, as the motherly bunny leaned forward to lightly kiss the girl on the forehead; afterward using a napkin to gently clean off the sweet coating covering her charge's face.

"Now be a good girl and eat up!" The lapine woman's smile right then grew wider than Rachael had ever seen it.

Said kitten though could only let out a light moan.
1113221211.title: Swing and a miss

11132212112.content:
Taffy hummed lightly as she washed the plate in her hand, clearing off the remnants of her kitten's last bite to eat; her eyes momentarily peering over to the portly feline behind her. Rachael sat, her big soft tummy digesting the sweet treat it had just received, while its owner's face did its best to not stare at the matronly bunny before her, her features growing flustered for a quick second when they both crossed eyes. To Taffy though, there was something else of interest on the girl's person. Her bib still securely laced around her burgeoning chest.

“I'm A Big Fat Kitty”, Taffy mentally mused, a smile starting to show on her face. The fact that the girl accepted it without a hint of resistance simply proved she needed her help.

Despite her sweet demeanor, the womanly lapine wasn't ignorant. She knew that Rachael was regressing, but really, was that so bad? Her mind wandered to a scene from a while back, where she consoled Sarah, Rachael's sweet younger sister, after the incident with Digit at the well. Sarah's striking words of wanting Taffy to be their new “Mommy” had really started to hit home in recent times. These two kittens had been without a real family for so long, it was obvious they needed someone to step forward and nurture them.

Sarah was simple. Mostly. Her saccharine outlook on life and childlike attitude, as well as her outright seeking a mother-like figure in Taffy, allowed the older woman to gently guide the bubbly blonde with a much lighter touch.

Rachael on the other hand was a much more hands on project. The black-furred kitten had several issues to overcome. The girl's crippling depression had shattered her once confident personality, and Taffy was determined to build her back up again. Though maybe gentler, softer, and from the looks of things, certainly rounder. The bunny reasoned that maybe given her kitty's current disposition, it wouldn't be a terrible idea to start right at the beginning, and give Rachael the tender care she so desperately needed.

Plus it was fun, too.

A light blush appeared on her face as she finished drying her last plate. She had to admit, she found this oddly enjoyable. It was kind of like role playing. Sure, it wasn't the high octane fantasy adventures she was used to, but there was some distinct allure to her playing the mother to her “Big Fat Kitty”. That's where the idea for the bib came from. She sewed it up one night on a whim, her heart lightly pounding as she looked at the final product. She was left conflicted on if she was going too far, but when her rotund ward accepted it without a second thought, Taffy knew she was on the right path.

“Now then”, Taffy sweetly sang, her fluffy tail wiggling as she leaned herself into the refrigerator. “How about we wash that yummy cake down with a nice drink?” The young gray-furred rabbit turned towards her charge, a smile in her face.

In her hand was an ice cold baby bottle filled to the brim with milk.

1113221211222.content:
Taffy knew that something like this might happen sooner or later, though thankfully right now it was just her other little kitten who managed to peer into the situation. Seeing though as how Rachael seemed to be a tad distraught from her sister seeing her in this state, the young bunny woman, not missing a beat, decided to guide Sarah out of the room to have a chat for a bit.

The pink haired hare knew she needed to word this correctly, or else things might get a bit out of hand, and she wouldn't want that. Some may find what was going on to be peculiar, but Taffy knew she was doing what was best for her kitties, and she intended to follow through. "Well hun, you see, your sister and I are playing a little game right now."

"A game, Mom?", the naive young girl asked, her snow white features still marked with confusion, but also a bit of wonderment. The moniker for Taffy slipped out as if it was completely natural.

Taffy, smile never once leaving her, bent down a bit to pet her "daughter's" head. "That's right, dear, a game. Your sister has been real stressed out lately, as I'm sure you noticed. So I thought we'd have some fun and play.”

“Like your role playing games?” Sarah shot in, currently enjoying the gentle caress of her mother.

“Right again sweetie, but this game isn't like one of those stressful fantasy adventures, it's more like a game of house. I'm role playing the mommy, and Rachael's role playing the baby.” Taffy wondered for a moment if that wasn't a bit too on the nose, even for Sarah. What she was saying wasn't exactly a lie, but it wasn't the whole truth either.

Sarah processed these words slowly. Her sister had gone through a lot of changes these past few months, but a lot of them she actually found kinda fun. Rachael was a whole lot less bossy now, and her big squishy tummy was nice to cuddle up next to, even if the black-furred girl got real embarrassed because of it. But now Rachael's a baby? Sarah thought she was the only one between them who jumped at Taffy being their mom, but boy, it sure seemed she was wrong!

This though did make her curious. All her life Rachael was her “big sister” (right now, in more than one way), but if Rachael was playing the baby, what did that make her? The gears in her head started to churn as she formed a mischievous grin. Maybe this could be fun!

“Hey Mom, can I play too?”

I mean, she's....she's a sweet innocent girl, even if she's hitting puberty." Taffy thought to herself, obviously conflicted on what she should do with Sarah, since now she's aware of her "game".

With a conflicting mind, Taffy was left with only several decisions at her disposal. Either 1) She carefully and gently guide Sarah down onto the same path as Rachael, filling up into the same role as her rotund big sister. 2) She slowly guides Sarah into the same role as Rachael, but give her more tender love and care. After all, out of the two cat sisters, Taffy had liked Sarah a bit more than Rachael, obviously due to her maternal instincts. Or 3) Try and find another option to keep Sarah tight-lipped about what she was doing with Rachael. Who knows what will happen if Mora and the others find out about this!

Eventually, Taffy had made up her mind, deciding what to do with Sarah. However, this came in the form of.....
11132212112222.title: What To Choose, What To Choose

choices: "Um, does that include having to wear...diapers?"
Actually, Sarah said a different response instead.
111322121122222.content:
Inevitably making her decision, Taffy chose to carefully guide Sarah towards the same exact role as Rachael currently was playing out. However, due to her maternal affinity toward both the blonde white cat girl and her now corpulent older sibling, Taffy decided to treat this delicate situation with some more tender love and care when it came to the young Sarah, as the lapine woman still smiled toward the young feline girl and said, "Why, of course you can play, dear! Do you remember when I said that your sister's been stressed out lately?"

In response, Sarah nodded yes in a rather childish manner, where Taffy glanced back at Rachael for a second or two before continuing to speak to the young white feline and explained, "Well, I was thinking that Rachael here needs someone to play with. You know, like a playmate." "A play....mate?" Sarah asked, cocking a blonde eyebrow in both childish curiosity and confusion, her feline ears very much open to her "Mom's" explanation.

"Yes, sweetie. And that includes playing together, taking naps together, you name it. Think about it: it will be like being a wittle kitten all over again! And I'll be there to help you and Rachael, like a Mommy should do. So, what do you say?" Taffy answered, giving a bit of the rundown on what to anticipate if Sarah decides to be her sister's "playmate", as her "Mommy" puts it. Eventually after a short moment of silence, Sarah looked back toward the lapine woman and said.....
111322121122222.title: Reasoning With Sarah

choices: Choosing to wear diapers. Can't be that bad, right?
Actually, she still hasn't made up her mind yet.
1113221211222222.content:
"Diapers? What would make you think that you have to wear diapers, sweetie?" Taffy confusingly asked, obviously slightly surprised but confused on Sarah's reaction. However, in response to what she said moments ago, Sarah spoke toward her "Mom", cheeks blushing a light pink hue, and answered, "Because, um....i-it's because babies wear diapers. And Rachael's a baby. So, um....."

Responding to what the blonde feline had said, Taffy wrapped her arms around Sarah, reassuring her when she replied, "Aww, it's okay, kitty! You don't have to wear diapers if you don't want to. I'm not forcing you to wear them after all. Though, I won't mind if you do choose to wear them." During the loving embrace, Sarah took into account of what her "Mom" had explained to her, which made her think about what she was going to do while she was roleplaying with her rotund older sister.

Eventually, after Taffy let go of the maternal embrace, Sarah made up her decision, which came in the form of....
1113221211222222.title: Padded Speculation

11132212112222221.content:
Sarah snuggled deeper into the hug with her mother, a light purring emitting from the back of her throat. This was what she wanted more than anything, and if getting more of it meant wearing a big, soft, puffy cloud between her legs, then the snow white kitty knew her answer. “Okay Mama, I wanna wear em'.”

Taffy chuckled lightly. “You're so cute sweetheart,” she said, as she gently loosened her embrace. “You and your sister are going to have lots of fun, I promise! Though I think if we want to do this right, we're going to need to get some supplies...”

XxXxX

Back over in the kitchen, Rachael still sat. Her caretaker hadn't “excused” her yet, and she didn't want to be a bad girl. So all she could do was contemplate things, as Taffy and Sarah were too far out of eye and earshot to make out what was going on.

This whole situation was a jumbled up mess. First she stumbled at her confession, then Taffy brought out that baby bottle, and then worst of all, Sarah came in to see it! Thankfully Taffy took hold of the whole matter, but still...

To top it all off though, she still hadn't had her milk!

Sitting at the edge of the table, just out of reach, the dairy ambrosia tempted the pudgy kitten who was still licking her lips from the generous meal she was just served. I mean sure, it was in that bottle, but the more she thought about it, the less it bothered her. In fact, she reasoned that lots of people drank from bottles. Bottles of water, bottles of juice, bottles of soda, bottles of anything in-between. What's a bottle a milk? Okay maybe this one was a little different- it had a nice safety cap on it to prevent anything from spilling, plus it had that rubber bit on the top that made drinking from it more fun!

Really, the more she thought, the more she realized that Taffy was being incredibly considerate by preparing one for her. It was just too bad that her sister distracted her, but hopefully her patience would-

The bottle of milk was popped into her mouth.

“Hiya sis!” Sarah said, her tone bubbly as ever, with her hand helping hold up the bottle that Rachael was being forced to gulp down.

“Now Sarah, be careful, you scared her!” Taffy gave the young kitty a lightly stern gaze as she took Sarah's spot. She continued to bottle feed Rachael, but in a much gentler manner; one hand on the bottle, and the other stroking the corpulent girl's hair.

Rachael though was supremely embarrassed. In her daydreaming state (something that'd become increasingly more common with her), she hardly noticed the others enter the room, and now this was happening. A thousand questions were whirling in her head. What went on between those two? What did her sister know? Why was this milk so good?

“It's okay kitten, your little head has nothing to worry about. Your sister and I had a nice talk, and I cleared up any misunderstandings. In fact, I have some surprises in store for you two!” Noticing her charge had drank the bottle clean, she gently guided it away.

“S-surprises?” Rachael asked, catching her breath a bit. Thankfully the milk didn't choke her.

“That's right hun, I'm going to be taking you two out shopping!”

“Yay!” Sarah interjected, jumping in at the moment to giver her sister a big hug, her body squishing into the black-furred girl's big soft belly.

Rachael could only look on wide eyed as the confusing and overwhelming situation developed before her.
11132212112222221.title: It does the body good

111322121122222211.content:
“Arms up. That's a good girl!” The praise of a young bunny woman filled the room as the last vestiges of a certain full-bodied feline's pajamas were removed. The expansive top of course neatly being placed in an adjacent hamper.

“Umm, Taffy, why are we doing this again?” Rachael squeaked out, a high pitched inflection added to the end of her sentence. The young girl was stripped down to her skivvies at the moment, and while this normally wouldn't be that embarrassing, as the two had shared many mornings at this point getting dressed and ready for the day, none of them involved her younger sister sitting in the room!

“Because, dear, if we're going to get you new clothes,” Taffy paused for a moment to take something from her pocket.“we're going to need to know what size you are!” A smile was strewn across Taffy's face that was almost as wide as the soft and flexible measuring tape she had just pulled out.

Sitting on top of Rachael's bed, her legs playfully dangling over the edge, Sarah looked on towards the scene folding out in front of her. She'd hadn't really seen her sister like this in the while. It used to be when they were on the road traveling together, they had no qualms getting dressed in front of each other, but ever since Rachael started to get softer, she'd become a whole lot shyer too, so this was a new experience. She looked so squishy and cute! Sarah almost wished she could curl up sitting on her rather than the bed.

There was a twinkle in Taffy's eye as the ran the tape across her frightful little kitten. First over her thick arms, once toned and muscled, were now soft and without definition; only capable of holding a fraction of the strength they once had. Then down her legs, so once used to travel and roaming, were now coated in a warm layer of blubber. The idea of walking even a mile now feeling like an arduous task. Third came the belly, the tape straining to properly wrap its way around the girl. It used to be that Rachael stuck to a strict diet, partially out of necessity, and partially out of pride in her physique, but that was far from the case any longer, with her round tummy by far being the most noticeable of the recent “additions” her figure. Each of Taffy's delicious meals proudly showed their conquest over the girl's midsection.

Last but not least came the bust, the tape having a significantly easier time here. Rachael was never the most gifted girl in this area, but Taffy seemed to have been “tutoring” her well, with her breasts now reaching to compete on respectable levels with any one of Las Lindas' current residents.

The grayed-furred rabbit couldn't help but smile at this. Standing to the back of her, the young kitten still wrapped up in the web of her tape, she leaned in gently to her ear. “My my, I think someone's gotten bigger~”

At that moment, the door burst open. “Hey Taffy, are you in here? Where's breakfast?”

Standing in front of the trio, still dazed and half asleep, was the matriarch of the farm, Mora Linda.
111322121122222211.title: Does she measure up?

choices: Skip to Rachael in the kitchen
1113221211222222111.content:
(A/N: Thought I might try and take the story in a bit of a different direction. We'll see how it goes.)

The room was silent as as the buxom bovine stood in the doorway, looking slightly disheveled as she rubbed the sleep away from her eye. She was currently clad in a pair of blue polka dot PJs that clung tightly to her shapely figure. As she blinked her eyes clear though and appraised the situation, her features grew a tad haughty. “Ooh, did I interrupt something?”

Taffy, loosening her hold on Rachael, turned to her employer and switched to her best poker face. “Oh, good morning Mora. I'm so sorry, breakfast just slipped my mind. I've been busy getting the kittens here ready to go out for a little clothes shopping.”

“Hi Mora!” Sarah waved, still lolling about on Rachael's bed.

“I see,” the matriarch's attention drifted from the other two as her vision zeroed in on Rachael, striding on over to the girl. Mora had grown to have some rather deep seated issues with the night skied kitten ever since she tried to make a move on Minos behind her back, but she had eased off a bit after the feline broke her leg during the incident with Digit. Watching the girl grow under Taffy's care had been... fascinating. There was something exhilarating about seeing the transformation of the kitten before her, as the once hard edges of both her mind and body rounded into something soft, meek, and in certain ways, cute.

She had allowed for a slump in Rachael's workload so her leg could heal, but let it continue even afterward for some admittedly selfish reasons. She wanted to see the extent at which things would go, and seeing the full figured body before her plain as day, she could could certainly see the way in which things had grown. Already caught in a compromising situation, and with her literal pants down, Rachael's rotund features were as red as a tomato, with her face staring like a deer caught in the headlight at Mora, unable to say a word. All this ignited something in the bovine, as her towering form leaned in to her, her left hand cupping the girl's cheek. “Well, I suppose clothes are essential,” she remarked, the stray hand absently drawing tiny figure eights on her target's soft belly. “Las Lindas needs its employees properly attired.” Her tone had a slight sultriness to it.

Taffy furrowed her brow, not entirely liking the intimacy being displayed, especially after having her fun interrupted by the person currently displaying it. “Well, they are growing girls.” Her tone though was slightly less saccharine than usual.

Mora finished one last circle on the girl and gave her a quick poke for good measure, eliciting an unintended “eep” from Rachael. Ignoring this, she turned to Taffy. “Yeah well, this is fine, but we've still got a couple of employees, myself included, who should be up and about soon, and they're going to need something to eat before getting to work.”

This annoyed Taffy even more, as she was hoping to sneak out before she could get bogged down with work. I mean it was the weekend, and while that didn't mean as much on the farm, she still felt she was warranted a bit of free time, but unfortunately, she realized, she might have gotten a little over-zealous with her game, and missed her chance. Just as she was about to admit defeat and tell the two girls that their trip might have to be held off for a bit, a voice squeaked out unexpectedly.

“Umm, I can make breakfast.”

It was Rachael. Her tone was sounding a bit shy, but there was a look of mild determination on her face that surprised the bunny in the room.

“Sweetie?” Taffy inquired.

“I- I don't have to go to the mall,” Her face turned down a bit. “You already have my measurements, right?”

“Well...” Taffy pondered for a moment, imagining her hands gliding over Rachael's soft and toneless body. Measuring tape in hand, of course. “Enough for now, I suppose.”

“Then you can just take Sarah out. I'll do your work! I promise!”

Taffy was hoping to make Rachael part of the fun as well, but if it meant actually going out now as opposed to not at all, this might be the best situation. There was just one thing nagging in her head that she needed to put on the table. “Are you sure it's not because you're worried about what people will say? I want you to know Rachael that you're a very beautiful girl.”

“I-” Rachael stumbled, her nigh constant cherry blush growing ever so slightly redder. “...Thank you Taffy. But that's not it! You always do so much for me, so- so I want to help out!” Determination started to return to her. “You taught me how to cook, and to clean. I can do all that stuff. At least for a day. It's the least I can do!” She then turned towards her bovine benefactor. “Umm, if it's okay with you, Mora.”

Something about this girl was enticing. So much different from how she used to be, but in a way Mora could get used to. Soft spoken, soft bodied, cute, and wanting to please. Far and away someone who could take away Minos. She'd been keeping a relative distance from the going ons between her and Taffy, but maybe she should get to know the new girl before her a bit more now. “Sure, we can give it a try. No harm, no foul.” she said, starting to take her leave from the scene. It'd be interesting to see how Rachael would act without being under the influence of her omnipresent bunny guardian for a bit. “I'll be down stairs. I hope my new cook is ready soon.” She gave one quick pass over at Rachael. “Pants optional.”

Rachael gave an embarrassed mewl when she realized she was still dressed in her undies.

Taffy started to absently look through Rachael's drawers for some clothes for the kitten. While this might not have gone 100% as planned, she could still easily make something of this. A slight smile formed on her face at the thought of her big little kitty getting a surprise tonight when she saw her new wardrobe and “supplies”.

Over off on the bed, a light snoring could be heard coming for a snow white kitten. Sarah, in all the hubbub, had fallen back into sleep.
1113221211222222111.title: Change of Plans

11132212112222221111.content:
Eggs, bacon, pancakes, hash browns, diced up fruit, juice, and an assortment of other iconic breakfast classics were currently being neatly arranged on plates for the current hungry residents of the farm. Rachael had tried. She'd become somewhat nuanced when it came to food over the past few months, and she wanted to do her best. After Taffy and Sarah had left to go out, Rachael had entered the kitchen with something to prove. Her current attire was her now usual affair of tight fitting shorts and a top that only did a mild service to covering her belly, but a new addition was a frilly white apron Taffy occasionally wore when making meals. While it only did so much to add “protection” to Rachael's form, she felt it better completed her ensemble.

The whole cooking process went smoother than she initially expected, with Taffy's teachings seeming to rub off a bit on her. Though she wondered if she might have made a little too much. There were three of them, right? Mora, Miles, Minos, and okay, maybe some for herself. She'd already eaten a teensy bit earlier, but a little more couldn't hurt, right? Right. Of course she neglected to realize she cooked more to the portions she regularly now ate at, but a hearty breakfast did the body good.

“Breakfast is ready!” Rachael spoke, her voice slightly louder than usual. As she walked out of the kitchen towards the adjacent dining room, tray of food in hand, she expected to see most of the inhabitants waiting for her to deliver, but instead, all she found was Mora Linda sitting alone at the front of the table.

The curvy cowgirl was nonchalantly pursuing the Sunday paper at the moment, only casually taking a look towards the big kitty before her. “Oh hi Rach', yeah, sorry, the other two said they had some business to take care of, so they couldn't make it.” That was partially true. Miles and Minos did have work on the farm that day, but Mora had requested (and in the case of Miles, bribed), that they go catch a meal elsewhere. The busty bovine wanted a little alone time with Rachael. “Consider this a test run on your culinary skills.”

“Umm, sure,” Rachael gulped. The unfit feline was actually a little unsure, really. She'd done her best to avoid Mora as much as possible due to the bit of bad blood they'd had. This morning in her room though had almost fried her brain circuits. Mora just striding right up to her, so confident, so dominant, touching her and casually caressing her like it was nothing. It made her feel so weak. Unlike with Taffy, she knew there was an edge to this woman, and considering their past experiences, and the debt she already owed her, Rachael knew she was firmly seated at a rung lower on the ladder than her.

Rachael placed a bountiful plate filled to the brim with scrumptious breakfast delicacies before her employer, with that just being one of several currently up for grabs. Mora, of course, raised a brow. “Geez Rach', you make enough for everyone?”

The big kitten shrank back a little. “Ah, hopefully? There's more if you're hungry...”

“No, this is fine,” the cowgirl grumbled, looking at the array before her. Nothing unusual to say the least, but it had an extra dash of skill and care taken into it that was not uncommon with most items made by a certain bunny woman. Shrugging, Mora took a big forkful of hash browns and bit into them. A surprise look of enjoyment forming on her face. “Come on, sit down. Eat. I'm not gonna do it alone.”

Carefully sitting to the side of her employer, her bum having trouble fitting into the unfortunately tiny chair, Rachael did her best to try and eat with a bit more refinement than usual, something Mora though was certainly not doing. Pancakes, fried eggs, sips of orange juice, it was obvious Mora was enjoying herself. Taffy had been careful to design meals nutritiously balanced for most of the residents of Las Lindas, sans Rachael of course, but Rachael's portions were far more giving, which pleased the red haired matriarch.

It wasn't uncommon for cowgirls to be a bit on the... bigger side of things. It was their nature! Mora though prided herself on her figure, and what little “additions” seemed to comes, were curves that were in, to most people, all the right places. Still, she tried her best over the years to not indulge. With Taffy though taking over the cooking duties at the farm, a bit of a dam formed up around her as far as food went. Day after day she ate mouthwatering meals and delicacies, but they always left her wanting a bit more. Here though she had someone trained by Taffy, who had no qualms about limiting her portions.

Which, to sum it all up, meant Mora made a pig out of herself.

First she downed her plate, then what was supposed to be Miles', then, the biggest of the lot, the plate that was supposed to be Minos'. Afterward she requested some extras from the kitchen, which Rachael freely obliged. The portly kitten herself had finished her plate plus an extra, but she was shocked to see Mora just tear into things. Maybe she liked it? Hopefully.

When all was said and done, Mora was leaning back in her chair, hand on her slightly bloated stomach, with a satisfied look on her face. “You know Rach', I think we might have gotten off on the wrong foot.”

The black-furred kitten said nothing, but had her eyes locked to the woman beside her.

“We might have had some issues, but I think you're alright. You sure know your food, at least.” Mora took the time to lean over and poke her lightly on the belly. “I think we should consider this a fresh start maybe. You in?”

Rachael beamed at this, happy that she was finally starting to mend some fences. “Yes!”

“That's a good girl,” Mora remarked, patting her on the head. “Now listen, since most everyone is off doing stuff, there are some things that I want you to help me personally with around the farm.”
11132212112222221111.title: Second Breakfast

choices: Taffy helps clean this silly calf up
111322121122222211111.content:
The next few hours involved Rachael playing as Mora's 'little' assistant, which wasn't too much of a harrowing task, as her bovine boss spent most of her time sorting through paperwork. Rachael was just glad that the burned bridges between them were starting to mend, and as her subordinate, she did her best to help out by double checking the work, providing a gentle ear as Mora complained about her daily grind, and preparing snacks.

Quite a few snacks, actually...

It seemed breakfast hadn't quite sated the cow girl as much as one would have expected, as the pattering of a particular kitten's toes could be heard going to and fro from the kitchen, collecting little treats for her superior (and maybe some for herself...). A chunk of it was just casual junk food, like chips and cookies (along with a tasty helping of milk!), but sometimes Rachael would be required to make slightly more elaborate items, like grilled cheese, or a salad (she made sure not to forget the extra croutons and ranch!).

Taffy had become rather controlling with regards to 'her' kitchen; it really had become one of her primary domains, and she always had a rather strict handle on what passed through the lips of Las Lindas' patrons, but with the matriarchal bunny currently out of the picture for the briefest of time, the actual matriarch allowed herself to indulge a bit more, egged on (mm, eggs...) by the fact that the girl she'd had a bit of a rocky road with (ah! Ice cream would be good...), had turned out to be a pretty decent cook, and the end result showed she could act like quite a 'cow', though that wasn't too surprising, all things considered.

It had gotten to be a bit past midday, and Mora had become a teensy bit nippish. She hadn't munched on anything in about thirty minutes, of course, and as such, called for work to be adjourned for lunch. She requested pasta, which Rachael sheepishly said she'd try at.

It took a bit of work, but the corpulent kitten had whipped together a hearty, and even a bit large for herself, serving of lasagna meant to be split between the two, though it easily could have fed a family of four or more, with its layers of cheese, dough, and sauce completely rich with filling calories.

*munch* “Mm, oh! This...” *bite* “This is pretty good, Rach'!” Mora said, as she scarfed down the Italian dish before her, the occasional flick of sauce making its way onto her furry cheek. Her stomach was looking quite bloated right now after a good half day of binging, but the cow was still steadily going along, as if making up time for past meals lost.

“Th-thanks!” Her compatriot smiled timidly back at her, grateful, but still somewhat shocked at the messy display she was seeing. She couldn't talk much about the amount of food, as she was going through the dish at just as much of an even pace, but Mora was eating just so... sloppily. She didn't want to say anything, but there was a bit of a splotch of red tomatoy goodness stained right no the girl's white sweater!

This was why Taffy made her wear a bib...

She was even tempted to offer up her's, when the sound of a car pulling up perked her ears. “Oh! That must be Taffy.”

“Hm?” Mora asked back, a large chunk of pasta shoved right in her face. Obviously too distracted to notice anything.

The sound of keys turning and doors opening quickly led to the sugary sweet tone of a certain white kitten filling the air. “Hiiiii sis!~ “

“We're home, everyone.” Taffy's more even voice spoke out.

More shuffling could be heard as the two made their way through the house, and eventually ending in the dining area. Taffy looked much the same as she did before she left, only carrying a rather hefty set of bags. Sarah though appeared a bit different, as she was donned in a fairly conservative green dress with big puffy shoulders, and frills that lined themselves across its various edges.

“Rachael I-” Taffy though stopped for a moment upon seeing her 'employer's' state. She'd been eating. A lot. And obviously not in a way befitting of most respectable adults. She looked slovenly and clearly bloated, with the marks of food showing on both her belly, as well as stained upon her features and clothing.

Suffice to say, she was a mess.

“Oh my.”
111322121122222211111.title: Mora's Handy Helper

1113221211222222111111.content:
“Oh uh, hey there Bun.” *gulp* The bloated bovine said, as she swallowed her last bite of pasta. For some reason, the way Taffy was looking at her made her feel like she was the kid who got caught with their hand in the cookie jar. Sure, she didn't technically do anything wrong, but she binged without the lapine's consent, and that seemed to have become a bit taboo in this household.

The bunny matriarch for the most part ignored what she said and turned to Sarah. “Honey, could you please take these up to your room?” She asked, indicating towards her bags.

“Sure thing, momma!” the white kitten responded, taking the parcels. She wanted to talk to her sister and tell her about all the cool things that happened while they were out, but Taffy was her mom, and good kittens did what they were told!

“Thank you, hun.” She said, turning now towards Rachael and pressing forward towards her. “And how are you sweetie, were you a good girl while I was away?” Taffy's fingers began to gently run through the chubby kitten's hair.

“Uh, Bun?” Mora tried to interject.

“Yes'm.” Rachael responded, closing her eyes and enjoying the attention and the feeling of the hands of the older woman.
