“That's very good. I see you're even wearing your bib. So well behaved.” The older woman's eyes turned towards a certain other girl in the room, while smoothly taking one of the napkins her black-furred ward had set out beside her.

“Taffy?” Mora tried to ask again, though this time it seemed she got the other woman's attention finally, as the bunny was slowly approaching her.

“My my, what am I going to do about you? Such a messy calf.” Taffy just let out an exacerbated sigh, and with complete disregard for the other girl's personal space, began to wipe the bovine's cheeks clean like an attentive mother.

“T-Taffy?!” Mora interjected, trying to get up from the treatment, but it seemed her gorging was finally starting to bite back at her, as the bloat she was feeling barely allowed her to get half an inch out of the chair before an “Ooph” sound could be heard from her.

Even if she wanted to try again, she was prodded by a light tap to the forehead from Taffy's spare hand, telling her 'no'. “Ah ah, not now sweetie, you just stay right where you are. I have a few questions I'm going to ask you.” She said, finishing her cleaning. Her hand then went right to Mora's belly, giving it a sudden and firm caress. “Like where did this come from?”

Mora just let out a sharp gasp as her taut tummy was touched. She was so full. “I was hungry...” She mumbled.

The expression emitting from Taffy's face was that of all but smug dominance, as she started groping the girl's stomach in an almost lewd fashion. This was just too good of an opportunity to pass up, and if she did this right, it could possibly end up killing two birds with one stone. “I allowed Rachael to make you breakfast, but I didn't say anything about more after that. That's very naughty of you, Mora, making my kitten work like that.”

In a more logical state, the bovine could have easily countered that she was the boss, and that what Taffy was saying (and doing) was completely out of line, but she certainly wasn't going to be given a chance to think clearly, not now, anyway. Doubling down on her assault, Taffy dived in with both hands now kneading her flesh with twice the gusto. She was awarded with a primal, and highly embarrassing (for the cow girl) “Moooo!” cry that filled the room around them. The bovine turned a deep and tarnished shade of red from this.

“And look at those clothes! So sloppy. And messy. How old are you again?” Taffy's hands were churning the cattle's belly in a straight rhythmic fashion; hard and fast, and unrelenting. She wasn't going to allow the wires in her head to start connecting.

Mora started to sputter a reply, but couldn't get the words out, as she felt Taffy's left hand grope at the pasta stain on her shirt, which, coincidentally, aligned just perfectly with one of her breasts, causing the cow to gasp a loud moan from the intimate action.

What made this treatment technically even more embarrassing for her was that she was actually a bit older than Taffy, it was her farm, after all, but Taffy seemingly chose to ignore these little factoids. “I guess it can't be helped that a young calf like you is so untidy. We'll have to fix that.”

Molding the fur between her hands even harder and quicker now, the perversity of the act on display clear as day, the bunny egged on. “But you know, you normally don't eat like this. Do you like Rachael's cooking better than mine? Do you?” It was a rather double edged inquiry, as said chef was currently in the room also, watching the show before her in utmost fascination, as well as with a bit of a blush on her face.

Mora was at the brink of delirium at this point, and it was getting hard to think, but for some reason, she felt like she needed to respond to this question. “N-no! I mean- Ooph! I like- I like both! It's just- Moooooooo! You don't make as much for me...” That last part was squeaked out in a weak and defeated tone.

Taffy abruptly stopped cold, taking a moment to savor watching the other girl catch her breath for a moment.

The domineering lapine wasn't done with her game quite yet though, as she slowly and evenly lifted her 'boss's' chin up. “So my little calf wants bigger meals?” She asked, staring directly into the emerald eyes before her, tears forming ever so slightly at the sides of them from stimulation.

Mora could only gently nod, completely speechless and lost in a tangle of submission.

And just like that, Taffy's hard edge softened, and she leaned in to kiss the girl on her forehead. “Then why didn't you just say something, silly? I'll make all the food you need from now on.”

The bunny pulled back from the shocked and heated cow in front of her and just smiled. “In fact, I think there are going to be some other big changes around here from now on too. I hope you don't mind.”

As she said this, two recently absent persons of interest, Minos and Miles, passed through the hallway, carrying a rather large and heavy set of cardboard boxes. The latter struggling significantly more than the former. “Where do you want this stuff, Taffy?” The bull inquired, not commenting on what was going on between the girls, having missed most of it.

“You can start setting things up in the girls' room. You're a real sweetheart, Minos.” The bunny only received a nod as the other two moved forward with the items.

Taffy then turned towards Mora once more. “Our first change for you though will be a change of clothing.”
1113221211222222111111.title: Bossing the Boss

choices: Let's see what Sarah's up to.
Actually, let's see what Alejandra is currently doing.
11132212112222221111112.content: Ok, so if you want to change things up somewhat, how about we focus on another character for a little bit hmm? What do you say, do you want to see how Sarah is doing? Or do you want to go for Mora's point of view? Or maybe....You want to see what Alejandra is doing right now?
11132212112222221111112.title: Changing Perspectives

111322121122222211111122.content:
Mora's heart was racing. She'd never seen Taffy act like this before. Everything about what just happened was so wrong. She was the boss! Taffy was a glorified housekeeper! Here she was though ordering people around, talking down to her, and even fondling her up!

It was absurd!

And brazen!

And out of line!

...So why wasn't she doing anything to stop it?

Right now she felt like her brain, maybe even her whole body, had been glazed over into a puddle of gooey mush. She was already acting fairly lethargic from the binges she'd had that day, but after that... intense chat (and rub... and kiss...) from Taffy, she was feeling like she couldn't even put up a fight against a wet piece of paper, let alone question the matriarchal bunny's authority. She barely even acknowledged Miles and Minos coming in, only passingly wondering if they heard her loud 'moos' from earlier, with whatever the rabbit woman saying to them going right between her ears, though her mind did perk up a tad when she said she was going to get a change of clothes.

Something about this whole situation made the blood rush to Mora's head. Taffy was treating her like Rachael. She, Mora Linda, head of Las Lindas, and employer of all these people, was being taken down to the level of the 'Big Fat Kitty'.

She was feeling oddly hot right now for some reason.

This whole time, she'd watched, even subtlety encouraged, Rachael's downfall into the state she was currently in, partially out of spite, and partially out of fascination. Watching her get bigger. And softer. And weaker. And kowtowing to whatever Taffy or anyone else said. Letting those events play out for her own amusement, as well as semi-excitement. Just watching was one thing, though, it'd be a whole other matter if she allowed herself to be involved on the receiving end of whatever game Taffy was playing. It could shift the whole dynamic of the household. Her household.

But...

There was something a bit exciting about it, too.

What did Taffy call her? A calf? Just thinking that made her feel weak in the knees. What was Taffy planning for her? Did she even want to know? All she had to do was assert herself just a tiny bit, and this could be over in under a minute.

But...

She was awfully stressed out, wasn't she? All that paperwork. Managing the farm. That binge from earlier was probably just one large manifestation of all that pent of worry and emotion. She hadn't really had a lot of free time to relax, recently, that was for certain.

Plus, she might have just noticed this now because she was in the position she was in, but she couldn't help but wonder if by letting Taffy smother Rachael, she wasn't yearning, just a little bit, to get involved with the act. She practically dared the rabbit to do something when she butted in on the dress up session she was having with Rachael earlier. And now she was getting that push back in full force.

The question was whether or not she was going to do anything about it.

The cowgirl bit her lip as her mind whirled around these thoughts. Maybe it wouldn't be so bad to let go for a little. Taffy was trustworthy. Of course she was. She was probably overthinking things a bit too much anyway. What could really happen?

Just then, breaking the farm owner out of her own thoughts, Taffy spoke. “Now come along dear. I mostly bought things for Rachael and Sarah while I was out, but I did dabble a bit in getting an outfit or two for you. Who'd have thought though you'd need it so soon?"

Taffy's hand was reaching out to Mora to help her up just then. It was now or never. Just do something, anything other than willingly submit to show that she wasn't interested. It was simple. She had a million miles of more leverage here.

But...

"Let's go. I want to get all of my little ones changed so they can look nice and pretty.”

Mora's heart was beating faster than she ever thought it could.

She slowly took Taffy's hand.

“Yes'm.”
111322121122222211111122.title: Mora's Choice

choices: Actually, a little more time has passed....
1113221211222222111111222.content: So, skipping a little toward in time, how much time has passed since what has occurred at Las Lindas?
1113221211222222111111222.title: Jumping Forward In Time

choices: However, Rachael then felt this warm feeling coming from her diaper's crotch.
Then, she heard the door opening, as Taffy entered to check up on her "kittens".
Actually, Rachael then noticed her sister starting to wake up.
11132212112222221111112222.content:
They say that a lot can happen with a single week. And for a few certain members of Las Lindas, that phrase takes on a literal meaning to the words "extreme makeover". And within said week, the lifestyles of Rachael, Sarah, and Mora have been drastically altered, courtesy of one lapine woman named Taffy.

But as the sun rose over the Las Lindas estate, it shone through a window on the second floor, taking a glimpse into what had become of both Rachael and her sister Sarah. Where once a pair of normal-sized beds were present, now laid a pair of giant baby cribs stood, both large enough for someone of Rachael's size and bulk. And speaking of the corpulent black feline, Rachael was still asleep, currently wearing a set of infantile clothing in her size, which appeared in the form of a large purple onesie. And underneath the onesie was a thickly padded diaper, held together by 6 diaper tapes.

Originally, Rachael was shocked by Taffy having to make her wear the infantile undergarments. However, Taffy's maternal charisma swayed the big fat kitty. But due to the diaper's bulk, it forced Rachael's fat legs to spread outward a little.

Though as for Sarah, she was given the same treatment, only the white feline embraced her newfound position, wearing a pink frilly onesie with a bulky diaper underneath . However, Sarah's body looked a bit more....softer than it previously did 7 days ago. She had a small chubby belly, her arms and legs looked slightly thicker, her face looked a little fuller, while her hips, waist, and butt looked a little bigger, and her breasts looked slightly plumper than previously. Overall, Sarah was putting on some of that "kitten fat", as Taffy would put it.

Due to the enveloping sunlight entering the room, Rachael was forced to wake up, sitting up with some difficulty due to her diaper's bulky padding. From there, she stretched her fat furry arms outward, letting out a deep yawn from her plump lips, looking with a set of drowsy eyes.
11132212112222221111112222.title: Infantile Lifestyle Changes

choices: A morning in the life at the new Las Lindas
111322121122222211111122222.content:
Rachael smiled dimly, letting the early morning glow of the sun bask over her, as she stared absentmindedly forward in her crib; a glazed look on her face.

Her crib.

Her onsie.

Her diaper.

So many new experiences had washed over her lately, it was a little crazy trying to keep up. She'd gone from a calculating vagabond and fitness freak, to being treated like a little domesticated kitten by the woman she professed to have a crush on. And that says nothing about the copious amounts of weight she'd gained!

But the crazy thing was, she didn't really hate any of the changes. In fact, for the first time in a long time, she actually felt happy. The black-furred feline had spent so long worrying, so long struggling, so long moping over every little thought since she broke her leg, that when Taffy, sweet and gentle as she ever was, casually told her she was going to put a diaper on her, something just clicked in her head.

She wanted this.

She wanted someone to take care of her, to tell her that everything was going to be alright, and to make all the hard decisions for her. Why would she ever want to be a grown up cat, when being Taffy's little kitten was so much easier?

Plus, it made her sister happy. Looking over at the chubby form of the still sleeping girl, Rachael couldn't help but smile. Truthfully, Sarah never really grew past being a kitten in the first place, so seeing her sitting in her fluffy diaper, and resting in her nice safe crib, was practically natural in Rachael's eyes.

And it had become natural for herself now, too.

The padded girl had to admit, she really had turned into Taffy's 'Big Fat Kitty', and in a way, that was kind of liberating. Kittens didn't have big adult worries, they didn't have big adult fears, or struggles, or questions about silly things, like how they could ever confess to being in love with a woman who declared her job in life was spoon-feed and baby-talk to them. As she was now, she just had to do as Mommy-Taffy told her, and all her needs would be taken care of.

So that's what she'd been doing. She let her mind soften just as much as her body, at least around Taffy. If she was told to eat something, she'd eat it. If she was told to wear something, she'd wear it. If she was told to suck on a pacifier, she'd make sure to open wide for her dummy. True, this wasn't much different from what she had been doing a week or two prior, but now she let her inhibitions run free. She didn't think about belittlement, or embarrassment, she just did as her mommy asked.

Life had become simple, and she had become a 'good kitty'. The sheer idea of her even confessing to Taffy, of her proclaiming her love to the bunny, seemed far and away impossible now. She lost that chance long ago, but in return, she supposed she gained something else. Taffy had become her and her sister's momma, and she didn't think either of them had been this content in their lives.

Maybe, in the end, this all had actually worked out for the best. She and Sarah had someone to watch over them, and make sure they were both being well taken care of.

There were just a few little wild cards to factor...

“Rise and shine, girls~!”

In walked Taffy, wearing, oddly enough, Mora's white sweater. The pink haired hare had reasoned that many of the clothes her new calf had previously worn were much too 'adult' for her, and as such, she'd confiscated them, as well as many of the other belongings she deemed unacceptable to be owned by the clearly immature cow.

Said bovine had marched in lock step right behind her, hair covering her eyes, and a deep red blush showing on her (now slightly chubbier face); the shade complimenting the frilly red dress she was now adorned in. A far cry from the many sultry outfits she previously flaunted in her more grown up period of life, this poofy garment was babyish to the core, while also almost contradictorily having an aura of tantalizing lewdness to it.

The trim of the skirt audaciously barely went down to her now much softer thighs, and if the silly calf were to make the simplest of wrong gestures, the rhumba panties covering her thick diaper would be put full on display to anyone who wanted to look, and all things considered, there was a fair bit more to look at with the girl now!

Hidden under the soft fabric of it all, on Mora herself, was now a gentle coating of adipose that showed Taffy was keeping up with her promise to feed her calf all she needed. Daily meals and in-between snacks from the nurturing woman had slowly begun to chisel and crack at the trim, womanly figure Mora once displayed; giving way to a cute new addition of pinchable 'baby fat' on her.

Given the cow's eating habits though, there was promise of much more of her to pinch to come.

To top off the ensemble she was donned in, a cute little copper bell was placed around Mora in a necklace-like fashion, that jingled and jangled every few steps as she moved. This was a recent regular addition that Taffy had found absolutely 'adorable', and made sure to have her put it on each and every morning. She kept on having to remind herself that when she went out shopping again, that she should buy something similar for each of her kittens.

Off in the corner, a low mumbling could be heard from one of those said kittens right then. “Mm, mornin' momma...” The young Sarah spoke, now partially roused, as she wiped the sleep from her eyes.

Rachael soon followed suit, with an equal “morning, mommy,” but her eyes were currently locked on Mora. She was curious as to what she was thinking, what she was feeling. Out of all of them, the bovine woman probably had went through the biggest set of changes, and by far the fastest. Mora had seemingly taken to being under Taffy's thumb like a cow to a milker, and the bunny woman was quick to take advantage of it. If she could do so much to the (former) matriarch of the estate in just a week, she had to wonder what the coming months had in store.

There were also the questions of what her relationship with Minos had turned into, but Rachael was hesitant to even think about stirring that beehive.

Taffy meanwhile was pulling the bars down from her kittens' cribs. “Now girls, we've got a big day ahead of us! It'll be fun, I promise, but before anything else, let's get you two dressed and ready for breakfast!”
111322121122222211111122222.title: Morning Routine

choices: Then, Taffy led the girls downstairs for a hefty breakfast.
Fast forward to when they're in the car heading somewhere....
Actually, Taffy did something else instead...
1113221211222222111111222221.content:
"What are we doing today, Momma?" Sarah asked, as she scooted her chubby padded behind out of her own crib, standing up on her plump legs, which were spread outward due to the diaper's thick soft padding underneath her pink onesie. In response to the chubby feline's question, Taffy's looked at Sarah with a tender motherly smile and answered, "*Giggle* You'll just have to wait and see, little Sarah. Now then, let's get both you and your sister all dressed up, shall we?"

"Okay, Mommy!" Sarah replied, willingly allowing the maternal lapine woman to begin undressing the chubby blonde kitten, leaving Sarah in nothing but a large baby pink bra and a thick pink diaper around her plump feline waist and hips. From there, Taffy proceeded to rummage through the nearby closet for some clothes suitable and appropriate for Sarah, which eventually resulted in the lapine pinkette to grab a red T-shirt and a large pair of baby blue overalls. In appearance, the overalls looked to be made of a combination between denim and fleece, as it sported a large pocket on the front. However, the most noticeable thing about the overalls is the large buttoned-up flap on the front of the overalls, which was used as an easily accessible way for diaper changes.

First, Taffy had Sarah wear the red T-shirt first. Sure, it was somewhat loose on Sarah now, but Taffy figured that her plump blonde kitty would eventually fill in the gaps quite nicely. Then, she inserted the overalls on Sarah, assisting the chubby kitten with putting each leg through a pant leg before pulling the overalls upward and button up the overalls straps. Finally, she had Sarah wear these short pink baby booties on her paw-like feet, completing to process of getting Sarah all dressed up for the day.

Shortly after finishing with Sarah, Taffy then shifted her focus toward Rachael, preparing to dress up her "Big Fat Kitty" as well. However, unlike Sarah, Taffy decided to give Rachael s more feminine outfit for today, as she stripped the purple onesie off of Rachael. Then, the lapine woman grabbed a large frilly purple dress, which was large enough for someone of Rachael's size and girth, while also allowing her thick diaper to be seen some as well. And for the finishing touch, Taffy's tied a large silk purple bow to the back of Rachael's long black hair, adding to overall adorable appearance.
1113221211222222111111222221.title: A Padded Morning

choices: Eventually after breakfast, Taffy had allowed them to watch cartoons.
Then, Taffy decided to take the 3 of them out shopping with her.
Actually, before she could do anything, Taffy heard the doorbell ringing.
11132212112222221111112222211.content:
Once her kittens were now fully dressed in their adorable infantile clothing for the day, Taffy then proceeded to give both the rotund Rachael and the plump Sarah a loving maternal embrace, finding their current garments to be quite irresistibly adorable and cute, while she kissed them each on the forehead and said, "Aww! Well, aren't you quite adorable in your outfits, my kittens. *giggle*" "'Tank You, Mommy!" Sarah gleefully replied, intentionally displaying this infantile lisp in her speech, easily embracing her new lifestyle as Taffy's "Big Fat Kitty" alongside her much bulkier sister Rachael.

However, Rachael simply kept herself quiet throughout the moment, her eyes concentrated on the fattened infantile bovine that was Mora Lindas, who was still blushing with great embarrassment upon her fuller cheeks, which were partially shrouded by Mora's voluminous locks of red hair. And yet, Rachael couldn't help but subconsciously suck on her plump left thumb, as if the infantile mannerism was soothing the rotund black feline. Of course, Taffy instantly took notice of Rachael's infantile behavior, where she responded maternally by grabbing a baby blue adult-sized pacifier she bought for her big black kitten at the Adult Baby store, Young At Heart.

"Do you want your Paci, Rachael?" Taffy asked, which prompted the rotund black feline to nod her head in confirmation, all while she still had her left thumb lodged inside her mouth. From there, Taffy displayed a caring maternal smile toward Rachael, carefully pulling the black kitten's plump hand and thumb away from her mouth, where Rachael then willingly opened her mouth wide enough to allow the pink haired lapine woman to insert the pacifier into her waiting mouth, which was exactly what Taffy had done with such ease thanks to Rachael's willing compliance. "There, all better." Taffy replied, watching as Rachael began to happily suckle on the pacifier dummy with gusto. From there, Taffy then proceeded to guide her two kittens and calf toward the Kitchen, speaking toward Rachael, Sarah, and Mora in a motherly tone as she said, "Come along now, girls. We have much to do today, and I want to give each of you a nice, healthy breakfast."

------

Eventually, after following closely behind the pink haired hare, waddling due to both their increased girth and the overall thickness of their diapers, Rachael, Sarah, and Mora soon arrived in the Kitchen, where Taffy greeted the padded trio to an abundant feast for breakfast. Splayed out upon the large wooden table, there were various assortments of delectable treats that were highly recommended for a hefty breakfast given their increased stomach capacity and appetite, ranging from stacks of cinnamon pancakes smothered in chocolate maple syrup, to blueberry waffles coated in a thin layer of butter and whipped cream, to even Taffy's trademark and most delicious dessert, Black Forest Cake, being somewhere in the midst of all those delicious cuisines.

Of course, due to their increased appetites, Rachael, Sarah, and Mora began to drool slightly in a mix between greedy infantile hunger and eager anticipation. However, being the dominant maternal figure to the two kittens and calf, Taffy stopped them before their stomachs took control, where the pink haired hare then spoke toward her kittens and calf as she said, "Ah ah ah, girls! I need to put your Bibs on first and get you seated, then you can eat. Okay?"

"Sorry, Mommy..." Sarah replied, feeling sorry for such bad behavior, her white feline ears drooping downward to the sides of her slightly plump head. Fortunately, Taffy managed to cheer her chubby white kitten up out that mucky mood, bringing Sarah back into her usual peppy childish self once more, skipping her way to the nearest chair off toward her right side, then sat her diapered behind down onto the wide chair, with Rachael and Mora soon following suit, waddling their way over to their respective chairs as well. Once her three diapered charges were properly seated at the table, Taffy soon pulled out three large infantile Bibs from a nearby drawer, then proceeded to tie on a bib to each individual member seated at the table: First Rachael, then Sarah, and finally Mora.

Then, Taffy approached the refrigerator and pulled out three large adult-sized baby bottles, each filled with succulent Chocolate Milk, as the pink haired lapine passed out all three infantile bottles to Rachael, Sarah, and Mora respectively. Once everything was properly in it's place, Taffy finally gave them her blessing to begin breakfast as she said, "Alright, girls. Dig in!" And right off the bat, Rachael, Sarah, and Mora commenced their gluttonous barrage upon the stacks of breakfast food with childish and infantile gusto, while Taffy consumed a foot tall stack of pancakes with the mannerisms of an adult, using a knife and fork to cut into the flapjacks for easier consumption.

However, some minutes after beginning such an abundant breakfast, Rachael had begun to encounter some difficulty reaching the rest of the food at the table, due to the combination of a somewhat full stomach and her rotund belly pressed against the table. Of course, being the maternal figure she now was, Taffy stopped eating, as she laid her plate on the table and approached the struggling Rachael, who began to whimper a little from such hindrance, despite her best efforts. Fortunately for the rotund kitten, Taffy had approached her, gently stroking the fat black feline's jet black hair with compassion and maternal intimacy, as the pink haired lapine gently spoke to Rachael with a motherly tone and said, "...It's alright, Rachael. It's alright. No need for tears. Do you want me to feed you?"

In response to her situation, Rachael timidly nodded in confirmation toward the motherly hare, where Taffy then proceeded to take a fork, stab it into two waffles, and then lifted up the two waffles in the fork's grasp. "Open wide, sweetie. Here comes the Waffle Express!" Taffy said, baby-talking toward Rachael, as the rotund black feline eagerly opened her hungry mouth wide like a baby bird accepting food from it's mother, feeling the delectable treat on her taste buds being carefully crammed into her mouth with relative ease, which left Rachael with a full mouth and puffed-out cheeks in the process.

"Don't forget to chew your food before swallowing, my dear." Taffy said, easily reminding the rotund Rachael to chew her food before swallowing. However, due to her mouth currently filled to the brim with food, Rachael had to do a lot more chewing, as her jaws performed big heavy chomping bites out of the waffle remains residing within her maw, which made these muffled crunching sounds as she chewed, until Rachael chewed enough times to easily swallow the mashed waffles down her gullet with a satisfying gulp. Once the deed was done, Rachael looked back toward the motherly Taffy, bearing a pair of plump blushing crimson cheeks, then asked, "...More...Pwease..." Upon hearing such an adorable response from the rotund diapered kitten, Taffy displayed a caring and motherly smile toward Rachael, continuing to slowly feed the big black feline until she was truly stuffed.
11132212112222221111112222211.title: A Hefty Las Lindas Breakfast

choices: Told her excuse to Minos & Miles, which they actually believed...mostly.
Told her excuse to Minos & Miles, which Minos believed, but Miles was doubtful.
Before she could speak, they heard the doorbell ring. Who could it be?
111322121122222211111122222111.content:
Eventually after a decent amount of time had passed, the appetites of Rachael, Sarah, and Mora were inevitably satisfied, each of them bearing a stomach that was noticeably packed and stuffed to the brim with delectable food underneath their large infantile garments of clothing. With a satisfied, cheerful, and maternal demeanor, Taffy eventually assisted each of her two kittens and calf up onto their plump feet, some needing more assistance than others. "Excellent job on finishing your breakfast, girls. And since you've been very good, how about watching some cartoons?" Taffy said, her tone being ever kind and motherly toward her padded "children".

Of course, being the childish and easily excitable member of the three, Sarah began gleefully hop up and down, her chubby body lightly jiggling from the sudden motion while she excitedly yelped, "Yay! Cartoons, Cartoons!" From there, Sarah happily waddled into the Living Room to turn on the television, having a giddy childish spring in her step, along with dragging Mora with her into the room. However, just as the rotund Rachael was about to join them, she felt Taffy's hand on her plump shoulder, letting the big diapered feline know that the pink haired lapine wanted to see her for a brief moment, where Taffy gently spoke toward her and said, "I'll be leaving you in charge of Sarah and Mora. Alright, sweetie?" "...Okay, Mommy." Rachael replied, just as Taffy then wrapped the large kitten in a motherly embrace before freeing her to join Sarah and Mora in the Living Room, allowing Taffy to clean up the dishes on the table and prepare Lunch for her kittens and calf.

------

Although, while Rachael, Sarah, and Mora were currently preoccupied with a simple animated cartoon displayed on the television, Taffy was preoccupied within the Kitchen, alternating between cleaning the dishes and meticulously searching through her cookbook, intent on creating new deliciously filling cuisines for her little ones... Well, not-so-little ones, but they were HER little ones nonetheless.

Now normally, she would usually use the dishwasher to clean the dirty dishes since Las Lindas has multiple mouths to feed, but there was always something about cleaning dishes manually by hand that seemed most soothing to the pink haired hare, allowing Taffy to peacefully contemplate on her personal thoughts. Within her subconscious, the lapine woman couldn't help thought about how "healthy" and "youthful" her two kittens and calf were becoming by the day, causing her heart to feel all fluttery on the inside. Nothing could ruin such a happy and fulfilling moment of bliss. However...

"Taffy... We need to talk."

A masculine voice rang out, instantly snapping the pink haired hare back to reality, where she stopped cleaning the dishes for a moment or two, then calmly turned around to confront whoever was speaking to her. Fortunately, she recognized whose voice it was, looking at none other than the athletic bull Minos, the "brawn" of Las Lindas. However, Taffy could easily see that the muscular male bovine wasn't alone, for Miles was also present, his black and white furry arms crossed in front of his chest. Having this instinctual feeling that they wanted to talk about a certain subject, Taffy continued to display a calm but cheerful demeanor toward both Miles and Minos, where she then spoke toward them and said, "Of course, Minos. We can talk."

From there, Minos and Miles seated themselves at the table, prompting Taffy to be seated as well, where she calmly spoke toward the two individuals and asked, "So... What is it that you want to converse about, Minos?" "You know exactly why we're here, Taffy." Miles answered, his tone of voice sounding more assertive than usual, though Minos was able to wrangle him in before he potentially snapped at the pink haired hare. Then, Minos spoke toward Taffy with a calm but stern tone in his voice and explained, "Taffy, we're here to talk to you about what you're doing with Rachael, Sarah, and Mora."

Although, despite the revelation of why Minos and Miles were talking to her, Taffy managed to keep herself calm and collected, even though the male bovine and feline were already well aware of what exactly the pink haired lapine was doing to Rachael, Sarah, and Mora. "...I see. Well, it would explain why Miles seems so...tense." Taffy replied, her mind coming up with the correct explanation regarding her handiwork upon Rachael, Sarah, and Mora. However, Miles couldn't help but become a little ticked off, thinking that Taffy was insulting her despite Taffy's good-hearted nature, where he slightly raised his voice and growled, "Tense?! You think I'm-"

But then, just as Miles was about quickly stand up out of the chair and continued his sentence, Minos stopped him before his anger got out of hand, forcing Miles back down into the chair as the male bovine said, "Miles, that's enough! You promised not to snap at her like that." Of course, being one of the more wizened members of Las Lindas, Minos managed to get Miles to calm down, where the muscular bovine then looked back toward Taffy and asked, "Care to explain to us why you're treating Rachael, Sarah, and Mora like they're...well, babies? Wanna explain why you're doing this to them, Taffy?"

Normally, she would need a moment or two to collect her thoughts to answer such a question. However, Taffy had anticipated that such a confrontation like this would occur eventually, so the pink haired hare kept reminding herself over the past week that she was doing this to help Rachael, and that Sarah was willing to help Taffy in Rachael's "recovery", while Mora was doing this because she lost a bet to Taffy, using the bet excuse as a way to cover up the true motive behind turning the head honcho of Las Lindas into a big diapered calf. Finally, with her premeditated thoughts front and center in her conscience, Taffy then...
111322121122222211111122222111.title: Of Cartoons And Discussions

choices: Minos walks in on the others watching TV
Stay with Taffy and Miles/Something else
1113221211222222111111222221112.content:
Taffy's ears- adept at hearing as they were, made sure to zero in and check if any of her 'children' might have naughtily been eavesdropping on the conversation at hand. She needed to word things quite carefully so as not to ruffle any fur.

“Well, it all comes back to Rachael's therapy, I'm afraid. The poor dear has been in such a frazzled state, that I realized maybe it would be best to try and start from the ground up with her.”

The lapine placed her hands forward on the table in a show that she had nothing to hide. “Did you know Sarah and her never really knew their parents? What I think they need most right now is someone to love them, and give them the care they missed out on.”

“And that means treating them like babies?” Miles' voice was dripping with doubt.

She though just kept on smiling sweetly. “Well I did say 'start from the ground up', didn't I? It was Sarah really who jumped at the idea, if you want to know. I think she needed a mommy more than anyone. Those clothes she's wearing? She picked them out.”

A memory of the silly little thing eagerly trying on outfits filled her head as she spoke this. “For the moment though, it might just be better to treat those two as if they were the kittens I'm treating them as. We don't want to make them feel uncomfortable in this tumultuous time in their lives, do we?”

“...It'd be for Rachael's health?” Minos cautiously asked. He hadn't exactly bought into the whole idea, but he thankfully wasn't planning to bolt out of the room.

Yet.

“Why yes, for Rachael's health. And Sarah's. I'm sure if you got a little closer, you'd see they're far better off now. Rachael is much sweeter, and Sarah is so well behaved!” The pink-haired hare was beaming now, like a mother doting over her kids- which wasn't too far off.

Minos though ignored it all. There was still one rather large elephant left in the room.

Or maybe bovine.

“What about Mora?”

The question had been weighing on the bull's mind for over a week now. Something had distinctly changed with the woman whom he thought was his girlfriend. Just like Rachael and Sarah, it seemed she had fallen under a strange spell cast by Taffy, where she followed her around like an obedient calf.

In some ways, maybe even more severely than the other two...

Looking at the bunny in front of him, she was wearing a set of Mora's old clothes, and seemingly had slunk into sleeping in the cow's own master bedroom. He didn't know exactly what was going on, but he had a good idea after being asked to set up a crib adjacent to the queen sized bed. Considering Taffy wasn't the one parading around in diapers, the chances of who it was for were pretty narrow.

That was another thing. Mora was wearing diapers. Frilly, crinkly little things with ruffled rhumba panties! She was dressing like a full on baby bovine, and it left him terribly confused. It didn't help that she kept on blushing and shuffling away from him whenever he tried to talk. He cared about her, but this was definitely a lot to swallow...

So preoccupied with this, Minos wasn't able to catch the slight glint in the eye Taffy had, before she returned to her normal, matronly demeanor. “In Mora's case, it's quite silly, actually. We got ourselves in a little bet, and right now she's living up to the losing terms.”

In an instant, Miles just snorted. “What kind of bet has someone prancing around in diapers and sucking their thumb?”

“I'm glad you asked, Miles.” Taffy started, cool tone kept, despite the other's attitude. “Mora is a very stressed young girl, having to manage a farm practically all on her lonesome. That's why I challenged her to take one single day off. Let her relax for a little while, and calm down.”

The whole story was a complete fabrication, but explaining to the two that she practically seduced her employer into submissive babyhood probably wouldn't have gone over well...

“When I caught her going over papers like a regular workaholic only an hour after our talk though, that's when I knew I had to step in. Since she lost, I told her, for her own good, that I was going to give her a bit of the same treatment my two kittens were getting, and for the time being, I'd handle all the troublesome 'adulting' she no longer needed to think about.”

When no one interrupted her to speak, Taffy continued. “So for the time being, you can think of me as your temporary Mora, I suppose! I'm taking care of the various paperwork and funds, while keeping the rambunctious set of little ones in line.”

Minos just paused to ponder. At least it all sounded like a story of... some kind. A way to sort the absurdity. The specifics were definitely out there, but Taffy's tone, with its sugary sweet edge, couldn't help but make it all look more reasonable than it probably really was. “...That seems like an incredible amount of work for you to deal with.”

“Oh, it is,” Taffy chimed. “But there have been some perks! Mora, very sweetly, offered more sensible sleeping arrangements, for someone taking on the role of head of the household from now on. She was also kind enough to donate some of the personal items she no longer really had a need for.” She shook her features in a wry fashion. “I swear, a calf like her doesn't have any business running around in the dresses I found in that closest!”

“I see...” There was so much here for Minos to take in, that he didn't even really catch on to the little addendums Taffy mentioned, like saying she was the head of the household 'from now on,' or that Mora donated things that 'no longer had a need for.' All he cared about was that he at least had some semblance of an idea of what was going on.

Mora was having a little 'vacation' from adulthood, and Taffy was taking the reigns at the farm in the interim- which was curious, but far from the most pressing matter at hand.

Maybe he was approaching this wrong. Getting answers from a middleman wasn't always the most helpful, and he'd been almost equally as shy around Mora as she had. “Can I... go talk to her?” He asked, slowly standing himself up.

“Of course!” Taffy intoned, quick to shuffle over. “Their show should be finishing up right about now anyway. Would you like me to come with?”

He just shook his head. “I'll call if I feel the need, but I'd like to get a chance to talk without her running off to you.”

“Well just remember to treat her nicely.” The 'mother' said; raising her finger on upward in a gesture of warning. “She's a fragile calf.”

“A fragile calf... right.” His voice had a slightly unfocused echo to it, as he moved from the room.

Waiting just a moment, Taffy allowed herself to sigh, as she saw him finally exit out of sight. A part of her wondered if it was the smartest idea to let Minos be unsupervised with the 'kids,' but she knew Rachael, her biggest 'little girl' (in several ways), would come waddling if something was wrong. Right now she still had a plate in the room she needed to keep spinning.

“*ahem*” Miles coughed; crossing his arms. “Listen Taffy, you might be able to convince muscle-brain over there that this isn't completely crazy, but seriously! You turned those three into a bunch of big fat babies! What is going on with you?”

The bunny kept quiet, letting her former boyfriend's accusations stew in her ears, before slowly deciding to pad on towards him; the young man still seated in his chair. “Miles, sweetie, there's no need for you to feel so... on edge.”

“Since I'm in charge now, I think I should tell you that things are going to be run slightly... differently here than they used to, and first on the agenda is to make sure that everyone has a calm and relaxing routine to live by. It's for the household's health!”

As her words were weaved, he hardly had time to notice when she started leaning down towards him; her gentle hand reaching to cup and tickle the edges of his cheek. “I can think of a few ways we can maybe help with your routine. Take out some of the stress.”

“Would you like that, kitten?”

The feline could barely stammer a word out, as his face flushed as brightly as he ever thought it could.
1113221211222222111111222221112.title: Taffy Knows Best

11132212112222221111112222211121.content:
Mora Linda, if she had to put it nicely, would say she was going through a very... unique phase in her life.

Currently sitting beside a set of exceedingly chubby kittens, whose features were too ensconced in some vapid 'edutainment' program to really care, she looked about as out of place as anyone else in the room.

...Which might cause some alarm bells to ring off, depending on who you asked.

Between mindless sing-a-longs, hummed by both the TV, and Sarah's off-key voice, she could hear a distinct 'crinkly-crack' come up from underneath her; a reminder of the fluff secured snugly around her waist.

However unlikely, the buxom, full figured cowgirl, and owner of this considerable estate of land, was now prancing around in a thickly padded, adult-sized baby's diaper.

Left unhidden by the childish, but embarrassingly short dress she'd been dolled up in, the tresses and frills of its skirt meshed together in a feathery outline, that instantly led one's eyes to drift downward, and notice the white cotton subtlety peaking out between her thighs. It was the comforting smell of baby powder however, that provided the final tip off, as she, much like the majority of Las Lindas' female population, had the sugary scent tickling her nearly night and day.

Pacifiers, silly cartoons, bottles of milk, and plenty of babyish bibs, the very grown up woman had somehow managed to entangle herself in a very 'grown down' set of circumstances, that, even now, she wasn't quite sure how she regress herself into.

...There was another level of concern though that was niggling its way into her mind.

Clothes could be changed, and powders could be puffed away, but more permanently, something else about her was being altered. If she reached for her middle, beneath the layers of her dress, she could find that her fingers sank into another kind of padded softness which now cushioned over her frame.

She was getting fatter.

Of course, it wasn't uncommon for cowgirls to be a bit on the... bigger side of things. It was their nature. Mora though, in months and years past, had prided herself on her figure, and what little 'additions' seemed to come, were curves that were in, to most people, all the right places. It appeared recently though that the extra food a certain someone suggested she 'needed', had been transgressively transferring itself to her waistline...

Before, she was svelte, but with a frame that could cause any person's eyes to linger a tad too long. She certainly wasn't skinny, not by model means, anyway. Her thighs always had an ample amount of meat to them, and her breasts were a prize that instilled envy in just about any other woman around.

Now though, she seemed much... gentler. Cuter. Like Rachael when this was all beginning. She was sporting a coating of fluff on her tummy that didn't look to want to dissipate no matter how much she sucked it in, and her hips too, which had always bordered the line between thick, and heavy-set, were far more deeply leaning towards the latter, with her dress doing nothing to create a more flattering illusion.

But more than any of these, her whole disposition was starting to change; coming off less prone to sultriness, and more prone to cuddling. It was a fine line to ride, but the very way she held herself was becoming meeker, as a result of the casual lessons and 'tuts' Taffy ingrained on a day to day basis. As the layers of weight were adding to Mora's frame, it appeared the natural weight of her maturity was equally peeling away, all thanks to the farm's new replacement matriarch.

Taffy...

Just hearing the name made Mora all lightheaded and tingly. That woman was the cause for everything, and simply trying to process the various feelings she invoked left her spinning. From the sheer mix of humiliation and shame she could instill in someone, to the pull she always did that brought them right back from the edge, so they could be smothered with motherly affection.

The former farmer had always thought herself to be very sexual- in the very least she had the body for it, but never in her life did she feel more heated, more turned on, then that day when, all of a sudden, Taffy came to her charged with this spark of... something.

She was so commanding. So absolute, and made her feel so small, but at the same time, had this maternal aura that made Mora crave for more. It was hypnotic, and she knew, despite the trepidations screaming in the back of her head, that she wanted to follow the lapine's words to a 'T'.

It was a state of submission she found astonishingly alluring, with the woman conducting it all tugging things in just a way that made her breath hold at a stand still. Mora had concluded that Taffy had a knack to push buttons well enough in people so as to create a uniquely wonderful gooey squirminess, that the cowgirl especially reveled in. Edging things along in such a way that the choices she was offered never felt forced, but were just another push in a willing game of total surrender.

Mora remembered being taken by hand, and dressed in clothing not too dissimilar to what she was wearing now. That was day one. Then came the extra meals, and the reduction to baby talk; days two and three. Finally, the diapers on day four. That was the real test to see how far Taffy's 'calf' was willing to take things, so when she bowed her head without an ounce of protest, that was the moment when the bunny knew she officially had a new 'little one.'

It came off almost as casual, when Taffy told Mora that she was going to be taking the cowgirl's queen-sized bed, but that she needn't worry, since she'd have a 'nice comfy crib' set up right beside to 'always be with her.'

A servile, eager to please 'daughter,' out to seek the approval and praise of her make-shift mother, was the simplest way to describe Mora's status currently, and also brought matters to the now.
11132212112222221111112222211121.title: Interlude

111322121122222211111122222111211.content:
The regressed, chubby bovine sucked on her thumb, as the credits to the show her fellow 'sisters' were watching rolled. The only thoughts left twinkling in her mind were of what the future had in store. Taffy seemed quite comfortable with keeping the current scenario going for the foreseeable future- and maybe even progressing it, but there were still quite a few hurdles that couldn't be outright ignored. Chief among them being the brooding bull boyfriend, Minos.

...Who Mora, so lost in thought, hadn't picked up had been spending his last few minutes, watching over her in silence; seeing the glazed look in her eyes, and noticing the dribbles of drool pruning her digit, as she nursed it.

“Hi Minos!” Sarah yelped; fully aware of him since he entered, but her cartoon meant that he was shifted to priority number two.

“H- hi.” Rachael echoed; her own situation with the man also quite awkward, but thankfully starting to simmer, as the kitten's attention shifted more to wanting to please her 'momma.'

It was Mora though who stayed in silence. A red blush covering her face, and a downward look of learned timidness taking up her features. This man was by far causing the most confusion and doubt to shoot through her mind.

The adult-calf knew she still cared deeply about about him, but she was at a loss for even how to begin explaining her new lifestyle changes. Living under Taffy's care made her feel so good, in a way that being with Minos prior had never provided, but the thought of having to face that fact in front of him always caused her to skitter off towards her 'momma' in an appropriately childish fear.

Whether she felt like it or not though, it seemed her padded rear was about to come face to face with reality.

She really wanted a bottle right now.

“Hi there... girls.” Minos was hesitant. He himself not sure how to handle it all, but he knew breaking the ice was a crucial first start. “You all look very nice today. Especially you, Mora.”

And to his eyes, it was true. Spending a few moments admiring her unperturbed, his girlfriend really had become a lot cuter. Minos always was a little distasteful towards some of her lewder, and more outrageous acts of behavior, but it seemed Taffy had really come to dull the edges off her in a way that he couldn't really describe, but didn't necessarily hate.

“T- thank you.” A bottle, a blankie, her mommy, anything. Mora was feeling very nervous at the moment. Her heart was thudding about as fast as could be, but she had an odd urge to lean in to the praise. Was he playing along? “Momma-Taffy helped dress me.” Saying that sent a warm bashfulness through her.

“Your momma did a very good job.” Minos was crouching down; making sure to look the girl in the eye, as his voice held itself with a very soft spoken tone. He was talking to a calf, after all.

“Listen, girls...” He was indicating towards all of them. “I still don't fully understand all... this.” A hand touched upon the shoulder of Mora's poofy dress, “but I want to let you know that I'll help if I can. Taffy shouldn't be raising children like this on her own.”

There was a slight pause, as the man between all of them casually recognized them as 'children,' before a certain white-furred feline quickly jumped on his words.

“Yaay~! Daddy-Minos!” Sarah yelped; latching her soft, chubby form towards his arm in a possessive hug.

This just caused the bull to blush about as crimson as Mora now regularly did; simultaneously trying to balance himself with the weight of the kitten around his arm. “W- well I don't know about 'daddy', but um, I definitely will be there.” He glanced over towards the calf in the room. “For you.” Then to the others. “And all of you.”

“Thank you, Minos. “Rachael said, the biggest kitty, and least 'immature' of the lot, walking towards him, and putting her hand on his back.

“Yes... thank you...” For the first time since she noticed him, Mora stopped shying her eyes away. “Daddy.”

The oxen just grinned lightly; finding the name more palpable on a repeat hearing.

“So, do any of you girls need a change?”

All the faces in the room except his lit up as red as the farm's ripest tomatoes.
111322121122222211111122222111211.title: Contemplative Cattle

choices: Digit, who looked just as bulky & babyish as Rachael, Sarah, & Mora.
Idward, who wanted to personally talk to Taffy.
Actually, it was someone else instead...
1113221211222222111111222221112111.content:
Bullshit. Absolute, unnecessary, and completely humiliating bullshit. Those were the only words that came to mind for the black and white feline known as Miles, just as the replacement matriarch of Las Lindas continued her relentless doting upon him. And yet, for some strange, unknown, and peculiar circumstance, he couldn't help but feel utterly flustered and immobile regarding this awkward conundrum he inadvertently found himself in, unable to respond with protest like he was clearly capable of previously. Within his subconscious, Miles had this instinctual gut feeling that this was part of the indigenous that converted Rachael, Sarah, and Mora into their current infantile states in the first place.

And now... Now he was about to unwillingly undergo the same exact process that ultimately transformed and domesticated the two "kittens" and "calf", as Miles felt Taffy slowly and carefully strip him of his jeans, sneakers, and T-Shirt, still bearing a greatly embarrassed blush on his feline face, whilst leaving him in nothing but his boxers and socks. "Now then, let's get you into some more...fitting clothes, shall we?" Taffy said, where she then casually strolled over toward the nearby closet, opened the closet doors, and pulled out what appeared to be a pair of baby blue overall shorts.

Judging from it's overall appearance, Miles could easily see that the infantile garment was, without a doubt, Adult-Sized. On the front of the infantile overalls, there was this large fleece flap clasped to the rest of the garment by two large clasping buttons, which meant that it was obviously designed for easier access to having one's diaper changed. "Great. Now she's gonna baby me just like Rachael and Sarah." Miles thought to himself, an obvious sign of disdain and disgust in his mental tone of voice, while he watched as the maternal pink haired hare searched through one of the drawers until she inevitably grabbed a white T-Shirt for Miles to wear underneath the baby blue overalls.

"Well then, let's get you all dressed up, shall we? *giggle*" Taffy said, obviously having this sense of maternal enjoyment in her demeanor and behavior towards Miles. From there, Taffy calmly and maternally spoke toward the feline and commanded, "Now, please raise your arms Miles." At first, he attempted to resist the pink haired lapine's demands. However, this inevitably proved futile, as Miles subconsciously raised his arms upward, thus allowing Taffy to insert the T-Shirt sleeves through each arm, then pulled the shirt downward toward his head to poke through the final opening of the clean garment.

Shortly after finally equipping the white T-Shirt onto Miles' slender frame, Taffy then proceeded to equip the infantile baby blue overalls onto the male feline. First, she unbuttoned the overall's straps so she could easily equip the infantile garment onto Miles with efficiency. From there, the maternal lapine pulled up the bottom half of the infantile overalls, covering up Miles' boxers in the process. However, Miles could easily feel how baggy and loose the baby blue garment was on him, which obviously meant that it was to be worn over a pair of thick bulky diapers. But then, just as Taffy was about to seal Miles into the infantile garment, both individuals were approached by someone familiar, which came in the form of...

choices: You know, let's see how Randal, Idward, and Sunny are handling this ordeal.
Actually, let's move onto someone else of importance instead, shall we?

How's Digit handling this, especially Mora's change?
