But then, just as she was about to act, Taffy snuck up on her!
Actuall, she suddenly heard the doorbell ring. Who could it be?
111322121122222211111122222111211232.content:
Bewilderment...

Hesitation...

And...utter confusion...

These were the very thoughts swirling within the ethereal subconscious of Digit, the youthful resident Spirit of the Las Lindas farm and estate. To elaborate, she first witnessed the drastically noticeable yet infantile changes and alterations in the Las Lindas household, with both the physiques of two feline siblings and a certain brown bovine, as well as the order of the Las Lindas hierarchy. Nonetheless, there was so much forced changes that she had to inevitably cope with.

And yet, while she watched as Minos changed the plump infantile Mora into a clean thick diaper from a safe distance, the youthful Spirit noticed that Mora was clearly blushing in embarrassment as she landed back onto the carpet floor, slowly waddling away due to the plush thickness of her diaper subtly forcing her plump thighs and legs to spread outward some, which made Digit cock a left eyebrow in confusion as she thought, "...What has happened to you, Mora? Why would you allow yourself to be thrusted into being dressed up as a baby?"

Suffice to say, this left with Digit pondering on the subject at hand.

From there, as she discreetly entered Taffy's bedroom, Digit gathered her thoughts and began to search through the webbings of the Internet. After all, even though she was classified as a "Spirit" like the rest of her kin, Digit was also partially an A.I (Artificial Intelligence), which allowed her to access the inner weavings of the World Wide Web with relative ease. While in the depths of cyberspace, Digit began to thoroughly search for anything related to what Sarah, Rachel, and Mora were enduring. Of course, this resulted with her delving into the more... "kinky" side of the Internet.

Although she finally found the necessary answers she was searching for, the overall results weren't at all what she expected... To her utter surprise, there were actual legitimate online communities that condone such adult infancy, known only as "ABDLs", or "Adult Babies & Diaper Lovers" for short. Digit's reaction to such a revelation was nothing short of shock and pure disbelief, especially considering that there was a legitimate internet community based around the concept and idea of reliving one's childhood and infancy. Now that she thought about it, this did make a lot of sense for why Sarah would dress up in such infantile clothes and wear diapers. After all, knowing the blonde feline, she always had this sense of youthfulness in her bubbly and childish personality.

But... When it came to Sarah's older formerly athletic sister, Rachel, and the former matriarch of Las Lindas, Mora? ...That...felt like a much more bigger enigma to the resident Spirit of Las Lindas, despite being already aware of Rachel's phase of depression some weeks back. Though on the other hand, Digit theorized that the reason why Taffy was babying Rachel in the first place was to probably build up the black feline's self-esteem to normal healthy parameters.

And yet, out of the three individuals, Digit pondered why Mora would allow herself to be placed in such an infantile predicament in the first place. Was it blackmail? No. Taffy was too nice and compassionate to commit such an act. Did Mora lose a bet to her? Possibly, considering the female bovine's somewhat competitive nature. Was Mora into this "Adult Baby" fetish as well? ...Probably, probably not. Digit wasn't entirely sure on that sensitive subject.

Either way, Digit knew that she had to get some answers by herself, so...
111322121122222211111122222111211232.title: Digit's Thoughts

111322121122222212.content: Alright, so shall we continue right during the shopping trip, or do you want to continue after Taffy, Rachael, and Sarah return from their shopping trip?
111322121122222212.title: Shopping Trip Time!

choices: Rachael or Sarah(?) try to back out
1113221211222222121.content:
The mall was sparely populated at the moment, typical for an early Sunday morning, but it still filled young Rachael with anxiety. Her body was just so round and big, that she felt ashamed every time she stepped out of the ranch. Plus her clothes barely fitting simply exacerbated the feeling that everyone was watching her jiggling form. During the car ride over she couldn't help but stuff her face with the baggies of scrumptious animal crackers that Taffy had prepared as a snack for the drive, but even still, they did little to cure her worry.

Regardless, she had to get clothes. That's why they were out in the first place, Taffy told her. She said that she and Sarah were such good kittens, that she wanted to reward them with a few new sets of apparel. Rachael could hardly disagree, because she knew she desperately needed them, but she still started to drag her feet a bit whenever she got an odd look or glance from the few shoppers who were passing by.

“Come along, dear.” Taffy urged, reaching back for a moment to take her charge by the hand. Said kitten blushed at the lightly intimate action. She probably would have been a lot more embarrassed because of it, if it wasn't for the fact that just to the left of her, Sarah was happily marching along, hand also linked with Taffy's.

“So where we going, Mom?” The perky feline asked. This was the second time in recent memory she'd been to the mall, the last time being for her birthday, where she got to have lots of fun looking at all the cool stores and going clothes shopping. She remembered the incident where Taffy and Rachael were reluctant to let her try on and buy her own clothes, which caused her to get quite peeved, but today was a little different. Today she was a kitten, and mommies knew best when it came to taking care of them. Plus Rachael was different as well. A lot different from the way she used to act a few months ago. She was a kitten now too, and kittens weren't allowed to boss people around.

“Oh just a little specialty store that I've been looking forward to visiting. It should have plenty of what you two girls need.” The lapine kept a smile up as her cryptic remark perked the ears of the two girls at her side.

Before either of them could inquire further about what she meant, the group turned a corner into a secluded portion of the vast and winding mall they were walking through, and sitting at the end of a long and mostly empty hallway, was an absolutely peculiar store. An assortment of soft, pastel colors engulfed the building, with its windows filled with mannequins wearing footed sleepers, and an assortment of other childish clothes and dresses. Overhead, drawn in the form of stylized baby blocks, was a sign reading “Young at Heart”.

Peering beyond just the front, one could see that the store catered to more than just clothes, with aisles filled with supplies of anything one could imagine for those wanting to replicate their younger years, but at a much larger size: baby bottles, bibs, pacifiers, cribs, and of course, diapers, were neatly organized throughout the store, with promises of more to be found if one wanted to look.

“You two are going to look so cute!” Taffy beamed, turning to look at her kitties.

Rachael simply gulped in response, really feeling like she needed some more of those animal crackers right now.
1113221211222222121.title: They've got a store for everything

choices: Eventually, they did find a store clerk to help them out in their shopping trip.
Taffy, Rachael, & Sarah get some supplies first before they found a store clerk.
Actually, let's skip to when they got what they needed & head back to Las Lindas
11132212112222221211.content:
But still, despite having that feeling of butterflies in her fat stomach, Rachael was left with no other alternative but to carry on and head inside the Young At Heart store, as she Taffy drag her toward the store alongside Sarah, walking toward the double doors, opening them upon entering the infantile department store. From there, the trio saw the various clothes and items that were stocked and shelved within the numerous aisles inside Young At Heart, ranging from adult-sized cribs to a vast array of infantile adult-sized clothes, including some that were made for someone of Rachael's size and bulk.

Since they were now inside the store, Rachael noticed that the floor is covered with soft pink carpeting. "Come on, girls. Let's go see if we can find a store clerk to help us get a few things." Taffy said, just as Sarah looked at one of the clothing aisles to the left, where she then tugged on Taffy's arm slightly, getting the lapine woman's attention as the female kitten spoke toward Taffy and asked, "Uh, Mom? Can we pick out our own clothes here?"

In response, Taffy faced the perky feline, gently scratching behind Sarah's left ear, showing a loving smile toward the blonde feline girl and reassured, "Why of course, Sarah! After all, there are lots of clothes for both you and Rachael. But first, let's see if we can find someone who can help us find some supplies and a few other things we'll need." "Okay, Mommy!" Sarah chirped, giggling like she was 5 again, as Taffy then held her and Rachael's hand, treading through the store to find a store clerk to aid them in finding some essential supplies for what Taffy had in store for Rachael and her younger sister when they return to Las Lindas.
11132212112222221211.title: Entering Young At Heart

choices: Taffy ends up feeding Rachael a buffet
Rach has a heavy breakfast, but gets on with her day.
1113222.content:
"Here you go. Today feels like a special day for some reason." Taffy said, laying a plate in front of Rachael, who was seated at two chairs at the table (the embarrassment was slightly less than trying to fit in one chair and breaking it). Taffy had served her a stack four high of thick french toast, homemade of course and bigger than most pancakes. It was drowning in syrup, snowed under in powdered sugar, and buried under fruit. Taffy normally worried over everyone's diet, but she seemed to enjoy using Rachael as an excuse to practice more delectable dishes. She also knew that Rachael had grown quite a sweet tooth, so it often worked to bring her mood up, at least temporarily. She managed to catch Rachael smiling at the food, unaware of herself. She thought the obese kitten had gained the cutest smile thanks to big, easily dimpled cheeks. She almost felt like watching Rachael eat. Taffy wasn't sure why, but those kind of impulses often came to her. She was just spending so much time with Rachael, she convinced herself, getting back to the stove.

Rachael, meanwhile, had already dug in. Her troubles seemed to lift off of her when she was eating. Only food and Taffy could bring her out of her funk. Beyond that, Rachael hadn't gotten to this size with some light grazing. She had slowly gotten used to her expanding appetite, and tendency to eat even when she didn't need to, and it had brought an unexpected side-effect. A few times, as she had started blimping up, Rachael would find herself polishing off a gallon of ice cream or something similar when she was full before she even started. The result would be this painfully full state, but this pain came mixed with and followed by this odd, full-body happiness. She could just lay back, belly taut and full, feeling like she was actually satisfied for once. The pain would subside and be replaced with this lethargic, slightly addled peacefulness that could last hours. She couldn't recapture that feeling often, but every once and a while Rachael would push herself to try and get this feeling back. She didn't care if she'd feel fatter in the morning - she always felt fatter. The problem was that this state left her all but comatose for a good couple hours, so she couldn't do it often, and especially not during a busy day.

"Oh, what the hey." Taffy whispered to herself, watching Rachael eat and smiling at the kitten's eagerness. "She's been doing so well recently, she deserves a treat." she got to stacking a plate full of six more pieces of french toast.
1113222.title: New Priorities

choices: The special day is Taffy's birthday - and no one's remembered!
It's an ordinary day (for now) as the two begin their chores.
11132222.content:
Rachael was happy for the second plate, and really surprised by the third. Her mountainous belly sat in her lap, wobbling about as she downed over a dozen pieces of french toast and plenty of fruit and sugar besides. She had to sit back from the table to accommodate her heavy frame, meaning more than a little of her food ended up on herself, down her chin and onto her shirt. Taffy just tutted at her, not mad at all.

"You make such a mess sometimes Rachael." she said, holding a cloth to her face. Rachael turned her head away, as if trying to escape, and took the cloth from Taffy.

"I'm not a kid, Taffy." she complained, wiping herself off. Taffy chuckled and petted Rachael's head, going right between the ears. That soothed Rach quite well.

"You certainly aren't." she cooed. Rachael wondered what she meant by that. She'd think that over later. There was the task at hand to focus on, namely, getting herself out of her chairs. Not too hard, but that had been a surprisingly large breakfast.

"Come on, my kitten, we have a lot to do." Taffy said, helping Rachael heave herself up. 'her kittten'? Rachael almost blushed at the pet name. Something was special about today, but she couldn't think of it either. Something had Taffy in a great mood. She was all smiles as Rachael righted herself. Rachael looked down at herself. Well, she couldn't see a lot past her boobs, but her belly felt especially heavy today, thanks to that breakfast. She knew it'd be slapping on her thighs all morning, jiggling about in a manner she just couldn't help but think was distracting. Rachael hoped that whatever was special about today wouldn't involve a lot of walking. She was really starting to dislike walking.
11132222.title: Something's Different

choices: They make it to the park
111322221.content:
"Today, today...." Rachael muttered to herself as she put away the dishes. "Is it arbor day? Uh, thanksgiving? Oh, is it an anniversary?" she couldn't figure out what was so special about today. She finished the dishes still deep in thought and took a seat. Taffy always allowed her a few minutes breather between tasks. At first Rachael had tried to ignore them, but she couldn't deny she needed them. She huffed, almost always out of breath, and did what to her was becoming an unwelcome habit - deep in thought, she drummed her fingers along her belly. She was practically stroking herself, and she always forgot it. It was as if her body was betraying her, getting some use out of these mounds of fat attached to her. But she couldn't help herself, idle hands always seemed to end up testing herself. Typically, Rachael solved this by giving them something to do - like feed her a snack. Rachael heaved her heavy self away from the table (which, at the rate things were going, would soon be impossible for her under her own power) and headed to the fridge.

"Just a little something...." Rachael said, sticking her head right in the fridge. She looked around, spying leftovers mostly, half a loaf of bread, and in the back...

"Heh, we still have cake from.....IT'S TAFFY'S BIRTHDAY TODAY!" Rachael yelped with sudden realisation. She jumped up like she didn't know she could - and smacked her head against the fridge shelf. Cussing and rubbing the bump, Rachael forgot her snack. She looked around. No decorations, nothing had happened at breakfast - there wasn't a single sign of celebration.

"No....no one's remembered...." Rachael said. "Not even me, after all she..." she balled up her hands, feeling like she wanted to punch herself. Or anyone else.

"Wait, where is she now?" she thought aloud. Rachael rushed out, huffing and heaving, just in time to see Taffy getting into the ranch car.

"Hey....hey Taffy!" Rachael wheezed. Taffy paused.

"Oh, hello hun." she smiled. "Did you want to come into town with me?"

"What? Uh, s-sure." Rachael said. She really didn't, but she felt so stupid for forgetting today she needed to do something. Taffy had to help Rachael into her seat. Taffy seemed her cheerful self as she guided Rachael in, helped her with her belt buckle, and squeezed the door closed.

"There we are" Taffy said as she got in the driver's seat, patting Rachael's belly. Rachael wished she wouldn't do that....because it made her feel good about having a belly. Which was weird, but not important now!

"Hey, Taffy..." Rachael started as Taffy pulled away.

"Yes dear?"

"Happy birthday." with those words, Taffy nearly swerved off the road in surprise. She collected herself, but for a moment Rachael had seen her bottom lip quiver.

"Thank you dear...." she said. Rachael sighed. The trip stayed in awkward silence until they got out of their car in town. Taffy also helped Rachael with getting out, which involved a lot of both of them trying to shift Rachael's belly into the proper position. Rach could hardly stay focused....Taffy moved and pressed against her soft form like she was kneading dough. But she kept her mind on the issue.

"Hey Taffy?"

"Yes dear?"

"Well, no one noticed your birthday, right?" she asked bluntly. Taffy's ears drooped.

"Now...we don't know for sure...."

"So, they probably won't notice if we spend a little time out on the town, eh?" she asked. Taffy was taken aback. Rachael typically treated going out like a punishment, forcing her body to be seen. This was the most spunk she had shown in months.

"I don't know dear, we really-"

"Taffy." Rachael stood steady in front of her, thumping one foot for emphasis (which made quite a resounding thump). "You deserve this. You deserve so much more." she was turning beet red, but held her ground. Taffy teared up.

"Oh...hun..." she reached out and touched Rachael's face. "Thank you. Sure, let's have some time out to ourselves."

"Great! Where do you want to go?" Rachael asked, hoping it was somewhere quiet. She was actually just shy of quaking, but something drove her to do this. Taffy deserved this, she needed it. She couldn't bear to see Taffy as sad....as sad as she always felt.

"How about the park?" Taffy said, pointing off a ways towards the edge of town. Rachael perked up. Parks were quiet.

"Sure!"

"...Do you want to call a cab?" Taffy asked sweetly. Rachael furrowed her brow - it was only a ten minute....walk....for anyone normal sized.

"N-no. It's fine! Let's go." she said. Taffy sighed, trying to hide her worry, as Rachael staunchly waddled off towards the park. Her giant black booty bounced up and down like jello on a trampoline as she tried to keep up a hurried pace. Taffy's heart just melted watching the girl. She looked so serious, even with her pouchy cheeks and two chins. She hadn't been like this in a long time - putting her all into what she was doing.

And she's putting it all....into me Taffy realised. It hadn't clicked, but....Okay, I'll have the best day today. For Rachael.

It took about a minute and a half for Rachael's pace to slow down. Taffy kept by her side, apparently fine with the leisurely tempo Rachael set. Rach was winded, but she wasn't going to give up! Taffy needed her big day. If only she could just....sit down for a minute....Rachael's eyes wandered about as they walked down the street. She saw her opportunity.

"Hey, Taffy! How about some ice cream for a birthday treat?"

"Oh, dear, I don't really eat sweets..."

"C'mon! You gotta treat yourself today!" Rachael grabbed Taffy by the wrist. Taffy just giggled to herself. There was only a short line, giving Rachael just enough time to scan the menu. She smacked her lips, staring at the sundaes, the list of flavours, all the toppings...

"Next?" the cashier asked. Rachael waddled forward, opened her mouth - and froze. Her terrible self-esteem kicked in. Here she was, fattest girl around, practically drooling as she got up to the counter, and she was in fact about to order enough ice cream for a middle school football team.

"We'll take two banana boat specials." Taffy said from around Rachael's girth. Rachael nodded quickly. Taffy drew out her purse as the cashier rung them up.

"N-no!" Rachael objected. "Not on your birthday." she dug into her pant pockets (which required her to wobble her body way more than she felt comfortable with - these pants were skin tight!) and drew out her ill-used wallet. It had enough....barely.

"Dear..."

"I've got it." Rachael insisted, paying for their ice cream. They were soon handed two large, elongated bowls with a full banana each that was split to accomodate five scoops, cherries, three kinds of syrup, and so much whipped cream it doubled the size of the dish. Rachael grabbed both and they found a seat by the window. Rachael reluctantly took two, trying not to notice all the people she was sure were looking at her.

They dug into their ice cream right away - at least, Rachael did. This wouldn't even qualify as a snack to her, but for a few moments she could ignore what an ugly fatty she felt like and just enjoy her meal. She was halfway through, and Taffy had only taken a couple tiny bites. Rachael drew herself out of her gluttony to notice.

"Don't you like it?" she asked. Taffy smiled.

"I..." she saw Rachael's eager worry. "I was going to let you finish it..." "...love it. It's just been a while." she took a heartier scoop. It was tasty, Taffy just tended not to indulge. But Rachael so badly wanted for her to enjoy herself....what could it hurt? Eating normally, Taffy was still far behind by the time Rachael finished. So the kitten just sat there, occasionally watching Taffy, occasionally looking out the window. And on occasion, seeing Taffy smile, Rach would smile back. It motivated Taffy to keep at it.

"Oh that was....oof, quite good." Taffy said, standing up cautiously. She had been full twenty bites ago, but she just couldn't help herself....this meant so much to Rachael. The kitten even now got their trash for her.

"Great! Well, the park's waiting!" she said. Hopefully she could make it...but she knew how much it meant to Taffy.
111322221.title: Each for the other

choices: Back home, Rachael begins to rethink her life
Continue in the park, where Taffy's got something to share
1113222212.content:
Rachael was panting by the time they made it to the park, and couldn't hide it. But they made it. It was a nice green area by a river that wandered far away, undeveloped area all around providing a little peace while still so close to the city. It was on its edge after all. Taffy took a quick look around, and spied a park bench that faced the water.

"Why don't we go take a seat?" she asked. Rachael nodded, not having the breath for a verbal response. In her exasperated state, her walk grew more unsteady, so her legs pounded against her belly and sent it quaking constantly. Her waddle was wide-legged as she tried to give her belly more room, but this only served to make her sashay her hips back and forth. She took up most of the bench when she sat down, and could hear it creak as she put her weight on it. Taffy sat next to her, perched on what space was left. Rachael looked taller than Taffy when sitting only due to her massive rump. Speaking of which, Rachael was wedgied bad - hopefully she'd find some time to fix it, though no opportunity seemed ready to present itself. She gave a sigh.

"I'm sorry Taffy."

"Hmm?"

"Here we finally got to the park, and I can't even..." Rachael stopped as Taffy giggled and laid a hand on her shoulder.

"Oh, Rachael. This is what I wanted to do! How often do we get to relax, just sit and take it all in? Even when you're resting you're busy. I like a bit of peace and quiet."

"Really?"

"Don't worry, my kitten. You're never a bother." Taffy stroked Rachael's head once and smiled before turning to watch the river. Rachael blushed, perplexed. She always felt like such a burden - a big, heavy burden surely weighing Taffy down. Oh, she knew Taffy didn't complain, but that was because Taffy never complained, right? Yet she seemed so sincere....she wasn't sure, but Rachael was beginning to wonder if really, maybe, Taffy didn't mind. Maybe, though she dared not hope, Taffy enjoyed her company? She couldn't possibly enjoy it as much as Rachael enjoyed hers....

Taffy giggled, breaking Rachael's train of thought.

"Deep in thought Rach?" Taffy asked, patting Rachael's big belly on the top of it's curve. Blushing, Rachael was too confused to answer right away.

"You always drum your fingers when you get like that. It's quite cute." For emphasis, Taffy ran her fingers up and down Rachael's belly.

"Ahh! That tickles!" Rachael complained, turning red. "I don't like....I don't mean to do it."

"Oh Rachael...." Taffy said, smiling at her. She closed her eyes, and very suddenly leaned against the kitten, resting her head on Rachael's shoulder. Even that had enough padding to be as soft as a down pillow.

"Thank you so much for today."

"But....we've barely done anything."

"I told you hun, I like a little peace and quiet. Just a little bit of the slow life. Call me simple. And I couldn't have had it with anyone else." she stayed half-snuggled against Rachael. Rachael was glad Taffy's eyes were closed, because then she couldn't see how red Rach was. But she looked down at Taffy, smiling and almost sleepy-looking, and the blush began to fade. Carefully trying not to disturb the bunny, Rachael began to reach across with her other arm (a tedious task as she had to mash her boobs nearly into her face with her arm) and reached for Taffy's head.

"This is the good life." Taffy said suddenly. Rachael stopped instinctively, her hand just above Taffy's head. She paused, smiled, and lowered her arm.

"Yeah, I, I guess it is."
1113222212.title: Slow down

choices: Rachael wants to throw a (belated) party for Taffy! With lots of cake and snacks
Rachael just asks Taffy if she could do something special for her.
11132222121.content:
Rachael could feel Taffy falling asleep, with her grey bunny ears folded over, her fuzzy head sank lower and lower against Rachael’s welcoming black fur, ultimately ending up using Rachael’s, stomach for a pillow. This was almost too much for Rachael. To the once just metaphorically thick skinned feline, Taffy’s slumbering reminded her of Sarah who had also used her big sisters body for a pillow many a time before. Rachael’s sisterly instincts took over once more and just as she used to do with Sarah, Rachael just gently tracing a finger nail (claw?) through Taffy’s pink hair. Rachael in this moment of ease of having Taffy snuggled against her blubber it just felt …well right. After a few minutes of this she could hear Taffy begging to stir.

“Oh. Sorry hun.” Taffy yawned with a stretch as she sat up. “Look at me sleeping away on my birthday.” She said dusting herself off as she stood up. “Did you take a cat nap too?” she asked extending a pink paw to Rachael. Rachael just managed to get up, and she too dusted herself off.

“I hope it wasn’t too boring.”

“No!” Rachael said quickly her rolls readjusting as she rose. “It was really nice actually”

“Well good hun.” Taffy said giving one of her classic smiles. “Oh Raspberries! I bet the others are just worried sick, we’d better go…” Taffy said as she bustled herself back to the ranch.

“Wait we don’t have to go Taffy…” Rachael began halfheartedly but Taffy was too far ahead and still sauntered on.
***


Back at the ranch Rachael was still abuzz thing over her perfect afternoon with sweet timid Taffy. Rachael was rethinking her life a little she wanted to really do something nice for Taffy, not just for her birthday but because she deserved it for all the hard work she did. There had to be something she could do to show her new found love appreciation for the hardworking rabbit...
11132222121.title: Rachael

choices: Three weeks in Rachael’s not doing so well, not as well as Miles at least
Two months later and Rachael was well in the lead her stomach had got quite big!
11133.content:
“Who wants the last piece?” Taffy asked as she carried the last big slice of chocolate cake to the table. Everyone seemed full enough as it was, licking their lips with the memory of the filling meal and delicious dessert they just ate. Well everyone except two certain black cats...

“I DO!” both Rachael and Miles said, raising their hands at the exact same moment for a second slice of sweet chocolate goodness.

Taffy looked stumped, this situation had surprisingly never happened before at the ranch. “Uh…” she began unsure what to do next.

“Oh like your slacker ass needs it!” Rachael said cutting in and pointing a finger accusingly at Miles. Chocolate cake was her favorite and after the hard day she just had there was nothing she wanted more.

“Ha! You should talk lard butt.” Miles said matching her insult for insult.

“At least I do some hard work around the house!” Rachael said raising her voice and tone.

“Pshht! Maybe for you math is hard work; I actually have a real job!” Miles said with an smug air about himself.

Both of them arose from their chairs almost ready to come to blows, but before the fighting escalated any further Taffy came up with the easiest of solutions. Expertly she raised her knife high, and cut the piece in two, the swift act silencing the cats. Taffy regained her smile and served the split serving to each of them. Both of the bickerers chewed their halve of a slice of cake while keeping a look of disdain towards the other. Neither was completely happy with the results, knowing that they had deserved the full slice. The both of them would have to settle this one way or another…

Miles approached Rachael after dinner that night, ready to take care of this problem.

“That was real nice what you pulled at dinner!” He said heated up and ready to finish their previous argument.

“Hey, I’m not the one who looks like a whiner after your little bitch fest.” Rachael said equally heated.

“I ...guess so…” Miles said, suddenly stung with the realization that his outburst hadn’t scored him any points with Taffy.

“Well then… we should settle this ahead of time don’t you think?” said Rachael. She too was realized she had been an ass, and had been a bad example for Sarah at the dinner table, all over a piece of cake. She couldn’t help it though; chocolate was her weakness especially the rich moist heaven that was Taffy’s frosted chocolate cake.

“So, how do we settle this?” Miles asked interested to see how this would play out.

“Well…it’s…uh…simple.” said Rachael as she began piecing together an improvised idea on the spot; she blurted out the first thing she could think of. “Uh the person …that weighs the most should get it right?”

“Hmmmm…” Miles could see where she was coming from. So it was a competition she wanted huh? Well he wouldn't back down from this little challenge of hers, but they would play by his rules… “Now wait a minute, muscle weighs more than fat. I mean look at Minos guy must be over 300lbs and he hardly touches sweets. We need to go by real results; we need to go by size.” he said miming an imaginary heavy weight wrestling belt around his trim waist.

“I see…so the one with the biggest gain in waist size wins huh? I get it, the biggest stomach has more room that needs filling. Right?” Rachael said playing along with this game.

“Right. So let’s say 3 months. Winner gets all rights to leftover desserts.” And as Miles said this, Rachael could sense he was really throwing down the gauntlet, taking things a step up from just a little bet. She could do even better...

"What? Why stop there? Let’s go a step further,say doing laundry duty for the other for the rest of the year?" she said compulsively raising the stakes just that much higher. Normally, Rachael wouldn't trust Miles within,well, a mile within in her clothes, but now with digit supervising it was easy as bringing it to and loading into the washer and dryer which was still a hassling chore. Rachael didn’t think twice about the bet, too caught up in her competitiveness to worry about the future of her trim and slim waistline. She just wanted to wipe the arrogant grin right off Miles face.

"Now you’re talking!” he said delighted at the idea.

“And just to make it official... " Rachael began and then gave a short whistle. "Digit!” she called.

“Digit here and reporting for duty!” said the electric blue and white nano spirit, as she flew out from a nearby clock. “Something you need Rach?” she asked in her sprightly high spirited voice.

“Uh, we were thinking about going clothes shopping could you take our measurements for us?” Rachael asked not daring to tell Digit the true purpose. Instantly she zipped around them, her finger making their fur stand on end wherever she dragged it along their bodies.

In an instant she was done and she gave a calming ring as she finished. *Boop bleep* “Complete.”

“And Could you save those for us please oh, also start a countdown timer for three months from now too?” Rachael asked taking in all preparations for this competition between her and Miles.

*Ding* “Done and done.” Digit’s voice rang. With that Rachael informed her that was all and waited till the resident spirit was completely out of sight before continuing.

"Well then it's set, biggest belly wins." Rachael said in a manner-of-fact way.

"Sounds good to me." Miles said before heading off towards his room for the night.

Just like that the belly-belt-size battle had begun!
11133.title: The Belt-Size Bet

choices: Rachael spys on Miles and see what he’s doing to grow so fat,so fast
Rachael looks for her own way to gain the upper hand in the competition
111331.content:
“Three weeks into this stupid bet and still nothing!” Rachael thought, as she studied her lithe figure in the full length mirror in her room. It was true her bodies’ high metabolism and her naturally energetic nature made it so she was having little success in her competition. Miles seemed to be doing quite well on the other hand. Now looking quite pudgy, his stomach had sprouted enough so that it was slightly distended, notably peeking out from under most of his shirts, serving as a constant reminder to their bet, and a sign of his growing lead. He couldn’t be happier about it, and he smugly smiled at Rachael from across the table at every dinner. It was a look that said “Only two more months till I win, and look at what I lead I have already.” Rachael grimaced, there was no way she would be giving up her chocolaty desserts there was no way in hell she’d be doing Miles dirty laundry.

Reinvigorated at the thought of what was at stake, Rachael tried to double her intake that night as she made her way to the dinner table.A pot roast was already laid out, along with mashed potatoes and corn, all of them steaming hot and obviously freshly prepared. She noticed that Miles took roughly double what she had taken herself that night. A mountain of mashed potatoes for herself and what she concluded was probably akin to an entire ear of corn. Rachael’s portions paled next to those of Miles. She still tried to eat with great gusto, but Miles seemed to pull away when it came to putting it away, eating with a new intense fervor and easily helping him to seconds and thirds of Taffy’s cooking. Rachael, throughout the entire meal kept one eye on her competitor. His shirt was pulled tight across his torso, straining at the buttons of his jeans ever so subtly. What’s more, it looked like Miles spare tire was growing as it perceptibly rolled over the waistband of his tightening jeans.

“M-my! You certainly have been eating well Miles.” Taffy said spooning more mashed potatoes onto his plate.

“Yeah, *hmph* well, a big hardworking guy like me needs too. *chomp*” he said between bites.

“You too Rachael. Are you guys working out more or something? Oh,uh, did you want some more too?” she asked Rachael carrying what was left of the pot of mash potatoes. Rachael was too busy cursing her metabolism. After only one measly plate, her body was telling her that it’d had enough. It was hopeless for her to try and stuff herself any further.

“Ugh, no thanks Taffy.” Rachael said moaning from her full stomach. She had actually had been turning down desserts every night this week, and after a dinner like she had tonight things were no different.

“Oh then, did you want dessert?” she asked concerned that something might be troubling Rachael. Rachael shook her head, almost getting sick at the thought of gorging herself on a slice of apple pie.

“I’ll have her piece.” Miles offered from across the table, still with an impossibly unsatisfied stomach. He snickered as he helped himself to another slice, watching Rachael leave the table with the others.

This was getting serious! At this rate Miles was sure to win. Tonight she would have to do something to keep up with Miles; he seemed to be putting the pounds on at an unbelievably fast rate. That was it! Miles had to be up to something on the side! Maybe she could spy on him and see what he was doing to boost his gains...Or maybe she’d just look for her own way to gain a competitive edge over Miles.
111331.title: Rachael's Belly is Behind

choices: Miles drinking a mysterious weight gain shake.
Miles being hand fed and stuffed by someone…
1113311.content:
The next day Rachael decided she would spy on Miles to see what was giving him the edge when it came to gaining. She went about her day normally, only taking breaks to keep a watchful eye on Miles whenever he left the room. Much to Rachael's dismay, Miles seemed to be as much of a slacker as he ever was and appeared to be doing nothing out of the ordinary to boost gains. It wasn't until much later that night that the answer to this puzzle of hers was revealed...

Rachael lay awake in bed that night panicking over the thought of losing Taffy's tasty treats, when she suddenly herd a slam from the door downstairs. She got up from her bed and peered out her bedroom window. Much to her surprise she saw the distinct chubby silhouette of Miles bouncing and bounding towards the ranch's garage. Sarah had long drifted to sleep, so it was easy for the lithe Rachael to silently sneak outside. Following Miles form, she found herself tracking him heading towards the garage.

Rachael peered in through the garage's small window to observe what exactly the cat was up to. Darkness abounded inside except from the soft glow coming from the mini-fridge light. Miles had kept a mini-fridge in his garage/"workspace" well stocked with beer and soft drinks for summer days, but now it was full with quite the midnight snack...

Looking closer Rachael could see...
1113311.title: A Secret Stash

choices: Rachael and Miles have another run-in but actually seem to enjoy themselves
Rachael's streched stomach gets her back in the gaining game. She wants to win!
11133111.content:
Peering in closer she could just see Miles was drinking some sort of shake. Whatever it was she bet that was what had been Miles' secret to success in this contest, she was going to make sure she got some too. She stormed into the garage catching Miles off guard.

“And what exactly are these!” she said pointing directly towards the cold canisters of weight gain shakes.

Miles mug curled, looking as it did right before he would make a snarky remark towards her, but then his face changed. He seemed to mellow out and calm down.

"They’re weights gain shakes, and they’re not against the rules…Look you can have the rest just to make it even." he said offering her the still unopened can in his hands.

"Well...” Rachael began surprised at this showing of fair game by the usually conniving cat. “Glad to see you’re playing fair for once" And after that she too paused for a second and calmed down before adding a “Thanks" as he handed her the can of thick looking liquid. She cracked it open and casually sipped at its contents.

"Yuck!" she shouted sticking her tongue out and spitting in disgust. "This is horrible! How could you drink this stuff?"

“Heh” said Miles scratching his head in modesty, "Whatever it takes to win right? No pain. No gain.” he slapped his stomach in a display of his “hard work” and its results. Rachael’s was mildly impressed by the chocolate colored cat's determination. She could appreciate the fact that Miles had at least dedicated himself to something, even if it was in an attempt to beat her, he managed to down twelve of these nauseating mixtures.

Not wanting to be shown up, Rachael doubled down and decided she would chug the large drink in one go. Tilting her head back she let all of the bitter chocolate tasting liquid flow into her mouth, forcing herself to swallow to keep herself from drowning in the stuff. Half way in she could already feel the gooey liquid pooling in her gut, stretching her stomach till it was reaching its limits, but she continued, dead set on finishing the can. Rachael couldn’t see as she chugged but Miles was watching as she downed the drink. It was his turn to be impressed as his cat counterpart finished the drink it in one shot, a task he'd never thought possible with a drink so thick and filling. He had to give Rachael one thing, she certainly wasn't a quitter.

"Well, uh, and then to the victor go the spoils huh?" Miles said at a loss for words and shoddily extending his portly paw for a sporty shake.

Rachael used her arm to wipe the shake residue from her mouth before shaking paws, feeling absolutely bloated from this stuff. As she shook his paw, she realized Miles usual obnoxious attitude had dramatically dropped since their bet began. Could his new pudginess be the cause, perhaps acting as an insulator to his usually toxic demeanor? Whatever it was she was beginning to like this new “healthier” Miles. She wouldn’t say he was good looking…well maybe a little; his broader backside did make his bubble butt look a little…cute.

The two seemed lost in thought as they stared each other down letting their handshake last a little longer than normal, but afterward neither of them said anything for the rest of the night.

The next day...
11133111.title: Shake on it

choices: “Do you want to do this again sometime?” she asked innocently enough
“Wanna’ get some Dessert?” she asked as she began to blush
111331111.content:
The next continued par usual for the rounder looking Rachael. She had just finished tallying up the farm’s expenses from the previous week and was feeling rather hungry. As she walked (now with a slight waddle) into the kitchen when she got there she happened to find that Miles wide rear end was occupying most of the fridge’s entrance

“Please tell me you’re not so lazy that you’re just eating just from the fridge now.” Rachael said mockingly.

Miles rounded face turned from the fridge door and towards Rachael. “Nahhh, there’s nothing good here, and Taffy’s not making anything till later tonight.” Miles said as he flicked the fridge door shut. “But hey….do you want to…maybe go eat somewhere?” he asked turning towards the kitchen’s floor shyly and bringing a flabby arm to scratch the back of his head nervously.

Rachael pondered the offer over. A hot meal sounded good right now, heck getting off the ranch would be good right now. Sarah was well pre-occupied with Randall, and she had finished her own work for the day. She could put up with Miles if it meant a big lunch.

“Well, I guess I can go…” she eventually agreed, trying her best to not sound too happy at the idea

With that the two clambered into truck with both of them feeling slightly squeezed in the front seat. In a matter of minutes the two had arrived at the largest buffet in Gossamer and were seated.

It wasn’t long until they both began piling their plates high with a variety of thick and calorific foods. Roasted chicken, barbeque beef, and delicious seafood, they were in a way holding a sort of mini completion between themselves as they ate. As she chewing through her roasted salmon platter Rachael found herself eating far more then she’d been ever able to, (which was due in great part to those shakes from the previous nights.) She was rather enjoying the feeling of her stomach stretching as it was filled with more and more with warm food. She was making sure to match Miles plate for plate but soon they both looked to have reached their limit. As they reclined in their booth each of their full furry stomachs were looking bigger and squishier than ever.

Rachael brought a paw and rubbed her stomach gently. It was quite soft and gave way to her touch now. She smiled to herself greedily anticipating it growing much much bigger in size. Looking up Miles seemed to be doing the same as he was nursing her swollen stomach. If they both kept eating like this they would be huge in no time. As she gazed across the table the sight of the overstuffed kitten gave Rachael an idea…

“Miles…” Rachael began
111331111.title: Bulking at the Buffet

choices: Skip to the day of the weigh in
The even fatter duo go out on another "date"
1113311112.content:
“Miles...do you wanna get some dessert...or something?” Rachael began with just the tiniest blush starting to form in her cheeks. She'd be the last to admit it but somehow, for whatever reason she was attracted to the new, fatter and friendlier Miles that sat across the booth from her.

"Uh...fine." Miles said not believing what he'd just heard. "Dessert sounds good, I guess your not such a sourpuss after all huh?"

Now he was getting too smug for Rachael's liking, she went back to putting up a front. "But come weigh in time don’t be mad when I come out on fat ass! Taffy's treats are mine!"

Miles only smiled and shrugged. “Whatever you say lard butt!"

The increasingly larger pair crammed into the car and made the short drive to the local ice cream shop. Miles had reached the door first and actually held it open for Rachael. "Ladies first...If you fit." He chided to her as she entered. Rachael tried to think of something she could say just as snootily back, but she lost her train of thought as she entered the sweet shop and saw gallon after delicious gallon of rich ice-cream kept behind a glass counter. Inside any fullness from the previous meals had seemingly disappeared, she simply couldn't decied what to try first.

"Double chocolate, double scoop sundae please." she ordered finally, the fox behind trhe counter nodded and went to retrieve his scoop when

"-Well then I'll have a mint chocolate triple scoop sundae" Miles blurted out then turned to Rachael with his oh-so-sly grin before adding "I guess I'm just a little more hungrier than you.

"Ooh so that’s your game huh?" Rachael said now ignoring the worker behind the counter to stare Miles down. "Well then I'll have a four scoops!" she said not jutting a finger into Miles soft flab for effect.

"Fine!" he said, (having to stifle a laugh from Rachael's prodding finger touching his very ticklish tummy. "Let's see you put your money where your moth is." he said actually really wanting to see her eat all of that ice cream.

"Uh...we only go up to five scoops… said the fox timidly from behind the counter.

***

Delicious~ was all Rachael could think as she swallowed another delicious mouthful of fattening ice cream.

Even after their little "fight" the plus sized pair still ate together, even offering each other samples of their sundaes. It was now painfully obvious that both enjoyed the new bigger version of each other but neither would be the first to admit it.

See Rachael was preoccupied eating ice cream Miles saw a chance to gloat. "Oh, man Look at all this!" he said leaning back in his chair and gripping a roll of fat that had formed on his stomach. "Yep, It’s sure gonna be sweet when I win.." he said trailing off as if he'd already won and was remembering it nostalgically. The teasing only redoubled Rachael’s effort and she ate with increased fervor, fat chance she was gonna let that happen. Rachael knew Miles still had a small lead on her, but she was closing the fat-gap with every swallow
1113311112.title: Hate Date?

11133111122.content:
“Well I never even wanted to go in the first place!” Taffy overheard Miles shouting from the next room. The shouts were followed by two loud and heavy pairs of paws thundering towards the front door.

“Fine I’ll go by myself then!” Said a much wider framed Rachael as she slowly moved past the couch eclipsing Taffy’s view of the cooking show she’d been watching.

“Oh no you don’t!” Miles exclaimed back as he followed Rachael's certifiably XXL behind that now pressed at the very seams of her pants.

Taffy only sighed. She didn’t know exactly what the two had recently seen in each other, but it sure seemed to have dug up some sort hidden emotions between the two (though they both adamantly refused admit it.) She watched as the tubby two squeezed out of the house’s front door and into the increasingly cramped car, glad they would be going out tonight. While Taffy had been nice enough to restitch some of their ripped clothes, and had made sure that both Rachael and Miles had plenty to eat morning noon and night, keeping them full now was quite a task.

---


“So where are you dragging me off to?” Miles asked trying to sound as uninterested as he could at the idea of another dinner date.

“Oh no, you’re driving you pick!” commanded Rachael. There was only two weeks left till their two month bet was over, and both of them had grown absolutely huge with fat quickly piling on to their bodies. If you had told Rachael before that she’d actually love being this fat, or actually take a liking to someone who was more than a little chubby (let alone Miles!) she’d have angrily knocked you over flat on the spot. But now..,now she couldn’t get enough to eat, she wanted MORE MORE MORE! Miles once slight lead in size had disappeared, along with Rachael’s six pack abs. Now with only two weeks away from the weigh in to claim Taffy’s delicious and supple desserts, Rachael was actually a little bit bigger than Miles now! Still neither had admitted that they’d actually liked the heavier set partners, using the bet as the only excuse to why they were seeing so much of each other.

Eventually they spotted a golden W glowing on the horizon and they pulled in for a feast. They both put in towering orders of burgers,fires, and a few shakes each. As their fast food arrived they squeezed into a booth (each easily filling their entire side) and began eating with incredible speed. Chewing through burgers and downing shakes rapidly, their stomachs began to swell taught as they were filled with fattening fast food.

Rachael noticed as Miles finished his second of many burgers that he'd been staring at her.

“What? Giving up all ready?” she asked annoyed.

“No...uh, you just have something on your face.” Miles said pointing a finger.

“Oh” she said shrugging at the weird comment and reaching for a napkin.

“It’s okay I got it.” Miles offered, and in the next moment Miles had leaned over and kissed Rachael squarely on the mouth,getting the left-over chocolate shake on her warm, moist, plump lips. When it was over, Miles pulled apart leaving a slightly stunned Rachael sitting there with a half eaten burger in her hand completely forgotten.

"Wow. Didn't see that coming," Rachael said, her mouth hanging open in shock.

Immediately, Miles began apologizing "Sorry, I—"

Before he could finish Rachael leaned over and kissed Miles right back. It was the start of a wonderful relationship.
11133111122.title: A Deilicous tasting date

choices: Miles and Rach get straight to "having fun"
111331111221.content:
Several hours later the duo was back at Las Lindas and were still unsure of how to go about their new relationship. No words were exchanged between them as when rode back, but both were noticeably blushing through their fur.

Currently Miles was in his room, simply laying in his creaking bed an trying to figure out what had caused him to kiss Rachael, not that he minded.

guess I really do like her... he thought as he looked up. And it took a food eating bet to make me realize it.

As he continued to muse to himself there was a knock at the door. Curiously the fattened gray and white cat got up and opened the door to show Rachael, still in her constricting clothes that exemplified her killer ass and soft, blubbery belly.

"Rach? What're you doing here?" Miles asked, somewhat uncomfortable, his already overworked heart was beating even faster than normal.

"I wanted to talk, can I come in?" she asked more meekly than usual. Miles nodded awkwardly and watched his overweight lover waddle into the room. The bigger of the two cats sat on her boyfriend's bed, making it sag noticeably.

"What did you want to talk about?"

"Us.” Rachael said. “Basically ground rules. “Like we keep this secret for now. I don’t think I could stand it if the others teased us.”

“I know what you mean, but we can still do stuff in private right?”

“Sure, I don’t think I’d mind that.”

“Well, we’re alone now, and the others are asleep so…” Miles trailed off, grabbing Rach’s rotund ass. Rachael gave him a kind of glare despite enjoying his boldness.

“You pervert.” Rachael said smiling; the plump black cat then patted a spot beside her. “I guess there’s no harm in a little fun.” Rach said before kissing him. Miles kissed back and started undressing and groping her while she tore off his clothes.

He always imagined that Rachael would be good, but her being fat didn’t diminish the pleasure he was getting from this little makeout session, but in a bit it wouldn’t just be making out. Within minutes both were entirely naked, nude with nothing but their fur to cover them.

Miles had to admit, Rachael looked much better with her clothes off, but she didn’t notice him looking her body over as Rachael was preoccupied looking at Miles’ manhood. Judging from her expression she was far from disappointed.

“Well…Want to go all the way?” Miles asked rhetorically, Rachael gave a playful smile and cut off the lamp with a meaty hand.

“Why not?”

Right after that....
111331111221.title: Something happens later that night....

choices: The next morning the two decide to call off the bet...
Hell No! The bet is still on! Skip to the weigh in!
1113311112211.content:
Miles reached over and gave Rachael's supple bottom a little pinch. "So, uh...top or bottom?" he asked unsure himself which position would be the oddest.

Rachael rolled her eyes before swatting away his hand. "You know you can't smell slime-y without Miles." She shifted her weight and flopped on top of him aggressively. "I don't know if you can handle all this, but we'll see." she teased mischievously.

"Oof-" Miles gasped as he was hit with the entirety of Rachael's weight. Damn she was heavy now, and his own big belly didn't do much to support her as she pressed down upon him. He could feel how her once proud and pronounced muscles were clenching up and flexing beneath her flab, if this was her first time she wasn't acting like it. "Easy now..." he warned her As their two stomachs collided Miles noted that Rachael's warm blubbery fur felt like a huge blanket and for Rachael Miles was the opposite, much like laying on a giant furry pillow.

"So when does it start?" she asked coyly. "Guess the rest of you didn't grow, along with you huh?" she teased Miles, unfazed by his "dynamic entry". Truth be told Miles had never really had 'problems performing," but now buried low and below all his new fat he couldn't tell if he was rising to attention either.

'Give it time'' He explained clenching his teeth'damn she was heavy. While waiting for the 'magic' to start he decided to keep things in the bed busy. His hands explored Rachael's chocolate pudding like body, weighing her new enormous knockers in one hand, and groping as much of her spongy and jiggly ass cheeks in his other. After about ten minutes of this literal heavy petting both of them were beginning to sweat but Miles could at least feel himself as he started to perk up.

'Hey! Oh! WOW!' Rachael moaned as the silky black hair on her back began to rise, all in response to a certain tingling sensation in her nether regions.

'Hey!'Oh!'That's'that actually feels...p.pretty good.' She muttered between two blushing dimpled cheeks and a stupid grin.

'S-same here!' Miles agreed though things hadn't gone exactly as he'd often fantasized with Rachael. He had expected a rough and fast round of love making from the strict and stern Rachael, but things had turned out to be sweet and slow. In and out he casually rocked his hips; Rachael and her stomach slowly sloshing along. It was hours later before the round of long large love making was over.

'Ahh-' the both sighed simultaneously. Rachael rolled off of Miles and on to the bed in a blissful ecstasy. Their forced to cuddle from the beds small size, the two fell asleep cuddling each other in their flabby arms.
1113311112211.title: Fatty Furry "Fun"

choices: With the bet over and desserts all their own, Rach and Miles try to lose weight.
Later on, a team eating competition is announced and they decide to sign up.
11133111122112.content:
Finally the day of the weigh in had arrived and Racheal and Miles were standing by the scale.

Since their little night together Racheal and Miles managed to make them common, yet secret occurrences. Around the others they decided to keep up their arguments and constant put downs, but when alone all they could do is stare into each other's eyes lovingly and sweet talk. Almost all of the other members of LL were aware that they were seeing more of each other, both inside and outside the bedroom, but said nothing out of fear

Also since then they'd find every excuse to go on more outing, mostly centered around food. Both of them had become something of regulars to every eatery in town, they were building a reputation as good customers. The result was that they both had gained a fair amount, but no matter how he tried Miles wasn't able to catch up to Rach's appetite. It was now painfully obvious that the once fitness obsessed girl was as big as a house. Still he'd go through with his word and finish the competition.

"Well the rule is ladies first, but since you're the closest thing you can do it Rach." Miles said snarkily, giving her a slight glare. The pudgy chat noir only scoffed.

"Please. Like you fit the description of a man?" she replied before putting one pudgy foot on the scale and then another. She waited for the number to come up and smiled. It read 529 lbs. "Hah. Eat it Miles, like I'll be eating that dessert tonight!"

Miles had to admit he didn't stand a chance looking at the triumphant raven haired woman. Her body was beyond plus sized, her large soft billowing stomach and love handles had grown exponentially since their contest's start, as did her once nonexistent breasts, now massive and milk swollen enough to compare to Mora's. Miles could only remember fondly how good her knockers felt, so soft to the touch and fun to squeeze. But as always her ass was her main attraction, by far it was the biggest part of her body without looking ridiculous. Her massive thunder thighs complemented them well and added to the jiggling and swaying as she walked in a seductive manner. Even her precious face was laden with fatty cheeks.

Her lover knew it was futile, but still he stood on the scale. It read 493 lbs. Rach had gained over 100lbs more than him. He began to sigh when he saw the number shoot up to 628. Looking down past his expansive gut he saw Rach had put one of her pudgy feet on the scale and acted as if she didn't notice.

"Well Miles, can you tell what the numbers say or what?" she asked keeping up her arrogant facade.

"628lbs. Looks like I win." he told her, a huge grin on his face. For a moment Rach grinned as well.

"Well good job fatso. You earned your dessert."

"Thanks alot fatass." he told her in a similar tone, but as he did he kissed her deeply. A moment later they noticed Taffy walk by and broke apart. "Er Taf! I was ju-"

"We weren't-" Rach began before the bunny Prime laughed.

"It's ok, it's none of my business really. But I am impressed that you two did so much just for my cooking." Taffy said. "If you like them so much I think I'll make extras just for you both."

"Really? You mean it?" Rach asked, her eyes sparkilng as if she was given a gallon of Gr8. Miles's expression was about the same.

"Sure. You two deserve it. Besides...I doubt one or two pieces will satisfy you." Taffy said.

"Gee thanks. So when can we get them?" Miles asked greedily. The rogue was practically salivating.

"Well I have one now." she said showing it to them. She handed it to Miles. "Since you won."

"Thanks...but I think Rach needs it more than me." he said handing her the prize. "After all a lightweight like you needs it."

"Gee, aren't you a real gentleman." Rach said smirking, she then shoved a piece in his open mouth as he tried to reply. "So there's your reward."

After that....
11133111122112.title: Hell No! The bet is still on! Skip to the weigh...

choices: That Ambar's sponsoring the event, and that there'll an extra prize at the end
111331111221122.content:
Time passed around Las Lindas after that little event, and not much had changed, including Rachael and Miles's physiques.

Well that's not entirely true since both of them had packed on another twenty or so pounds each and were in need of some new clothes. That's why they were in Gossamer to go shopping, and to maybe pick up some new clothes at the same time.

The plus sized duo were strolling through the mall and were eating anything they could buy since it was just after payday. Miles had his arm around Rach's oversized middle, the sassy female smiling as she sipped some of a milkshake with one hand and fed her boyfriend a few cookies with the other one. As they continued to waddle along Miles's hand managed to part of Rach's ebon furred belly that wasn't covered by her shirt. She felt a slight satisfaction from the contact, but withheld a cookie from Miles as he craned his neck to bite it.

"Hey, what's the big idea?"

"You know what happens when you touch me there," the black cat scolded, "it always makes me feel like kissing, among other things."

"And that's bad because?"

"We're in public. I don't feel like having people stare at us..."

"What does it matter if they do? We shouldn't keep from being with each other just to keep folks from staring." Miles reassured holding her hand. "Besides there have been pairs with much bigger differences."

"That is true." Rachael said as she drained the last bit off her sugary drink and kissed Miles. The two cat Primes held that kiss for quite some time until both of their stomach's began to growl. "Hm weird, we just ate and I'm already hungry again."

"Don't worry about it. Your next meal's on me." he said as he took her inside a nearby fast food place. The duo ordered one of everything on the menu and finished it in record time. The two of them had enjoyed the meal, but when it time to came to pay up the gray and white cat noticed something.

"Hey Rach look, there's an eating contest next week." Miles said, "It's a team event though."

"Hm, works for me." she said managing to stand, "what's the prize?"

"Well from the looks of things a ton of cash." he said, "and it also says..."
111331111221122.title: A few weeks later a team eating competition com...

1113311112211221.content:
“We need a third member.” Miles read.

Rachael frowned at this set back. Where could they find another member in so short of time, it sounded that there would be a lot of prize money at stake so (like with most things) Rachael really wanted to win!
“Do we really need a third member?” she asked confident that both of their large appetites could do more than enough eating to make up for a third person.

“Yep. It says three people required” Miles said pointing a pudgy paw to a line in the rules.

Crossing her flabby arms across her chest (a difficult task consider her new full grown boobies were in the way) Rachael could only fume and think of a third member. Maybe…just maybe someone at the ranch would suffice. They wouldn’t have to be as big as Rachael or Miles just really good eater. Then again considering how big some of the other primes of Neo-Earth were maybe they could give whoever they selected a crash course of sugary fattening treats before the contest began…

As luck would have it they didn’t have to wait long before their third member practically invited themselves, the next morning Rachael was approached by none other than…
1113311112211221.title: The missing member

11133111122112211.content:
“Rachael can I ask you a question?” Sarah asked the next morning to her now even bigger big sister.

“Sure sis anything.” Rachael said still resting in her bed not quite ready to wake up
.
“Promise you won’t get mad?” Sarah said looking bashfully downwards.

“Yes I promise” Rachael assured her sister.

“Well…are you pregnant?”

“WHAT NO!” Rachael impulsively shouted. Then remembering her promise quieted herself “No, silly. What make you say that?” she asked in return practically laughing.

“Then why have you gotten so…heavy?” Sarah asked ever the curious one.

Rachael saw Sara had stopped just inches away from saying fat. All while she was gaining Rachael had been so devoted to the idea of beating Miles that she hadn’t thought of what Sarah might be thinking.

“Oh, well… In case you haven’t noticed Miles has been getting a lot bigger too. And I don’t think he’s pregnant do you?” Sarah giggled and shook her head. “You see, we were having this little bet and all, and well…” She looked for an excuse to explain her outrageously competitive behavior and found little defense for her extreme eating. “We got a little carried away.” That’s when an even better idea occurred to Rachael, maybe she just found the third member.

“In fact Sarah, how would you like being this big?” she asked with a sly grin.

“What! Just like you? You mean it?” Sarah began going from zero to hyper in seconds flat.

“You’ve got to work hard, there’s big contest next week and I want you on our team O.K.?” Rachael instructed.

Sarah pressed her brown paws together. “Please! I wanna be all wobbly and heavy too!” Sarah announced practically shouting, happy to do anything with her sister.

“Awesome.” Rachael said coolly. “Now help your big sis out of bed, you’ve got a big day ahead of you…”

11232.content:
"Sarah, Sarah, do you have a minute?" Digit asked, darting towards her in midair. Sarah Silkie turned around with a smile on her face. She had a basket of apples in her arms, headed to the barn.

"Hey, I'm almost done. What's up Digit?"

"I learned a new trick with nanozell nanites. Here, come on, let me show you." the exciteable ghost swished around like a caffeinated hummingbird.

"Haha, just give me a second, c'mon." Sarah turned back towards the barn and heaved her load in. It was midday, and most people were indoors for a break. Sarah, typically, had slept in and had already used up her 'break'. The end result was that the barn was empty and people were scattered about the ranch. Sarah put down her basket in its proper place and turned to Digit.

"Okay, what's so exciting?"

"Look." Digit said. She reached forward and grabbed at Sarah's exposed stomach. Sarah giggled as a tingle came over her. Digit began to pull back, and to Sarah's surprise, her stomach came with the ghost! Well, not quite, but Sarah's skin stretched around like it was a rubber suit, and she could barely feel a thing.

"W-whoa!" she said excitedly. Digit let go and Sarah's skin snapped back into place. Digit giggled, rushed away, and came back with a hose.

"Trust me, check this out!" she said, holding it up to Sarah's mouth. Sarah got the idea and, out of sheer curiosity (she was a cat after all!) let Digit put the hose in her mouth. Digit let the water flow and Sarah gulped it down as fast as she could. After several minutes, Sarah realized she wasn't getting any fuller, or at least it didn't feel like it. She took the hose out and looked at herself.

"Haha, so weird!" Sarah's belly had inflated steadily like a water balloon. She looked like she was heavily pregnant, a big round belly on her skinny frame. She pushed it and found it easily sloshed around, her skin still having plenty of skin.

"Crazy!" Sarah said. "Haha, I could freak Rachael out like this." she said, putting herself in a pose. Digit giggled.

"It's so weird, and so easy. I can do it to pretty much any body part, I think. Or all of it...."

"Hmm." Sarah heard this, but an idea had gotten to her. She sure could freak Rachael out - or she could do a little more. She and Rachael had played jokes on one another in the past, but Rachael was much better at it - she also did it less, but that meant Sarah always got caught. Since coming to the ranch she and Rachael had played a lot less. This was the perfect opportunity.

"Hey, Digit, want to play a prank." the mischievous kitten asked, her face going into a devious smile. Digit was surprised, but grinned and giggled. They were a dangerous, adorable team.

First off, Sarah knew she was going to have Digit do her rubber trick on Rachael, but where?

Mora drifted asleep soon enough, easily passing into her dreams. At first, her dreams were made from fragments of recent events as expected, but they soon shifted to things totally out of the ordinary for the young bovine lass. In one, she was seated at the head of the dining room table, but she was totally alone and there was a vast feast laid out, the table groaning under the weight of all of the food. The smell of all of the wonderful foods before her caused her stomach to give a hungry grumble, followed by another louder one. Because of this and how wonderful all of the food looked, she didn’t wait any longer before digging in. The first bit caused an explosion of flavor to overwhelm her, as did the one after that, and the one after that, and so on and so forth. Each piece of food proved more delicious than the last, so she lost herself in the pure delight of eating, not realizing how much she was gorging on. Upon seeing Mora in such a state, Taffy tutted before saying “Mora, you were supposed to eat everything I made for you.” Mora was about to respond but the rabbit cut her off by continuing, “I guess I’ll just have to make sure you eat every last crumb then.”

Mora felt so self conscious as she sat at a table in the back of the restaurant, barely looking up from her wineglass as she toyed with the stem. The slinky black backless dress she wore had been a gift, and not something she usually wore. The top piece of the dress looped around her neck and hugged her breasts, breasts that had gotten a bit bigger as of late. In fact, her whole body had gotten a bit bigger as of late, something that was only adding to her embarrassment. It also didn’t help that she was sitting in a rather fancy restaurant, beyond her usual fare when eating with the rest of the people at the farm. She had been invited out though, and she wasn’t about to turn down this invitation, so she had to make the best of it. Time continued to slip past as she waited, and waited, and waited some more. She had already refilled and drained her wineglass several times and was starting to experience a bit of annoyance as well as concern. Mora tucked a loose lock of hair behind her ear and scratched around one of her small horns, then stood up ready to leave and maybe make a phone call. She stopped when she heard a familiar voice, and took her seat again as she saw Alejandra being led to the table.

“Sorry about the wait, got tied up at work, couldn’t even call,” Alej said as she took her seat across from Mora.

“I was starting to wonder,” Mora responded coolly.

“Oh don’t be like that, I wouldn’t miss this, you know that.”

The black and white bovine tugged slightly at her dress, similar to Mora’s but in a deep blue and with a slightly different cut. Alej also hadn’t put on any weight as Mora had, so her dress hung a bit differently as well, showing just a little tantalizing glimpse of her cleavage, white with just a hint of pink coloring the soft view. Her stomach was also just as trim as it had been, compared to Mora’s that pushed out the front of her dress and lightly rested on her thighs. Alej had also let her hair grow out a bit so that the black and white tresses hung down to about her shoulder blades.

Mora was still surprised from time to time how this had happened. When Minos left again, putting the end to their relationship for what seemed the last time, Mora ended up pretty well torn up. No one could break the bovine woman out of her funk till Alejandra gave her some tough love and got her to come to her senses. At first this strained their recently mended friendship, but that was quickly smoothed past as Mora started to feel better as the days went by. It took a while, but Mora also noticed how often Alejandra would tempt her with food; things like a box of candies to “heighten her mood” or a tub of ice cream after a hard day. Mora was just enjoying having Alejandra as a friend again, and the farm had been going spectacularly, so she wasn’t all that concerned with indulging a bit.

The real shock came when they went out to a little diner after heading into town for a bit of business. That night had started out simple enough, just the two of them chatting about the recent events over their orders. Alej had been acting a bit more restless than usual, and it seemed that she had something on her mind. Mora didn’t pry; figuring that the other woman would say what was on her mind if or when she needed to. She didn’t have to wait long though as after they were finishing with dessert – with Alej somehow convincing Mora to get both a slice of pie and a big milkshake – Alejandra suddenly reached across the table, grabbed Mora’s shoulders and pulled her into a deep kiss. After the initial shock wore off, Mora felt her toes clench from a wave of unexpected pleasure. She also ignored the fact that Alej grabbing her had resulted in a cup of water getting knocked over, soaking her shirt and sending a chill down her front.

After the kiss broke, Mora was a bit stunned, certainly too stunned to react as Alejandra dashed out of the diner, leaving Mora behind. It was a couple days later that Alejandra showed up at the farm, and explained how she felt about Mora. Mora was as stunned at this as she had been at the kiss, but warmed to the idea in time. She also hadn’t been expecting the offers of food to only increase as their relationship entered a new stage, resulting in her steadily increasing weight. She was torn though, between the unease about her ballooning size and the joy she was getting from Alejandra, and she didn’t want to mess that up. Some small portion of her mind was also actually starting to like the feeling of her stomach being packed full – and usually a bit beyond – of whatever food Alej was offering, and tonight wasn’t looking to be any different. Alejandra had just finished ordering, and had apparently two full meals for Mora in addition to one for herself.

“You al; right, you looked like you were lost in thought,” Alejandra said, after sipping some of her wine.

“Sorry, just thinking about…us, you know. It’s still a bit of a shock sometimes.”

“Hmm…I know that feeling, but doesn’t it feel good the rest of the time?” Alej said, as she lovely caressed the back of Mora’s hand.

Mora nodded at that, before asking Alejandra about what had kept her. Alejandra’s response as well as the following conversation kept the two of them busy until the food arrived. There was a steaming hot plate for Alejandra and two larger plates for Mora, with the waitress having a somewhat quizzical expression but not saying anything as she set the plates down and moved along. Mora gulped slightly as she saw what Alej had ordered for her, but the hopeful expression on the other woman’s face made Mora dig in, slowly at first, but with increasing speed as the wonderful tastes filled her mouth.

It was an average night at Tila Sunrise’s Guild Hall & Inn and the place was as rowdy as ever. Tila was currently serving an elven customer who looked to be reaching his limit worse yet he was looking to be an angry drunk. She could to tell he was going to be trouble, and made a move.

“Hey, why don’t you fetch me another mug of Meade wench” the rude elf orders.

“You’ve had enough…pay your tab and leave.” she commanded, raising her voice only slightly as to not rouse the other patrons.

“I’ll tell you when I’be hab enof…you…you ugly coyote!” the elf yelled nearly tumbling from his seat.

“Tila will tell you once! Now one yells at me like that in my guild hall, and now I’m asking you to leave…

“I told you *hic* I’m not leaven’” the elven elementalist said still in a stupor.

“O.K. we do this the hard way!” Tila’s gargantuan body lumbered quickly over the bar, and grabbed the meddling alchemist by his long elven ears, and the back of his robe. She hoisted him to the hall’s door and tossed him high into the air and onto the cold wet ground outside.

“Let that be a lesson, maybe next time you’ll know your limit…” she scolded him and headed inside.

Laying there on the ground his drunkenness driven out by anger and rage, the elven elementalist uttered a chant under his breath. “Foul feline temptress! May your mouth run dry and the sting of your spirits be ten times as wicked.” With that incantation a blue glow flowed from his fingers tips and flew into the air, hitting Tila covertly in her wide muscular back. This would be a sight to see for sure, he'd given her an insatiable thirst and made her body respond to liquid as if it were ten times the amount she was drinking, she'd would be as big as a whale within days, and then he'd make her beg him for mercy. Well he’d have his revenge on the bar wench yet, but now he had to find another place to stay…
---

As she closed up her hall that night, Tila was exhausted. After taking a warm bath in her luxurious ivory tub, she helped herself to a tall stein of mead to relax. Then another and another and another still! She was beyond parched, and every mug seemed unable to quench her thirst. Perhaps she was getting drunk the room for the room was beginning to spin, and she was feeling strange. She decided to sleep away this strange thirst she had.

As she lay down in her grand bed, her body by and large felt peculiar, it wobbled as she rested on her bed. It was almost as her stomach had expanded from the alchol she’d drunken. In fact, her whole body felt puffier, swollen? Oh well, hopefully she would feel better in the morning.

Tila…
